Now, the present offering of incense,
From the **virtue/power** of the **Enlightened Ones**—the **Great Saints**, the **Supreme Experts**, and the **True Ones**—whom we have taken refuge in.

After attaining the **Dao/Way**,
We shall forever safeguard eternal existence,
And align our harmony with the **True Way**.

In this evening’s solemn assembly,
We ascend the platform to practice the **Dao/Way**,
And invite the **Dharma Assembly** to perform these three incense offerings.
May this incense smoke ascend directly to the heavens,
And pay homage to the **Supreme True Teacher Treasure**.

We, the subjects, take refuge in body, mind, and **sacred life**,
And prostrate ourselves with our heads to the ground.

Relying on the **Supreme Three** and the **Ten Directions’ Saints**,
We humbly pray that the **virtue/power** of these incense offerings
May flow back to the **Sacrificial Host** of the certain household,
To themselves, their descendants, and all kin—both inner and outer—
That their **wealth and longevity** may be extended,
Their sins and blemishes purged,
Their calamities and misfortunes dispelled,
Their blessings and auspicious signs abundantly attained,
And that this grace may universally reach all beings—human and celestial—
Sharing equally in immense blessings.

Now, this offering of incense,
From the **virtue/power** of the **Teacher Treasure**—the **Great Saints**, the **Supreme Experts**, and the **True Ones**—whom we have taken refuge in.

After attaining the **Dao/Way**,
We shall eternally safeguard eternal existence,
And align our harmony with the **True Way**.

Repentance for all directions,
Subduing the **Life-Destroying Demon**,
Three invocations, three obeisances.

The **Grand Lecture** commences, and we solemnly recite the **Dharma Rank**.
We, the subjects of certain rank, along with the officials present at the platform,
With utmost sincerity, humbly prostrate ourselves,
And pray to the **Supreme Three**, the **Ten Directions’ Saints**, the **Highest Truths** of the **Ten Extremes**,
The **Martial Celestial Bureaus**, the **Divine Hosts of the Sacrificial Feast**,
And the **True Sovereigns of the Ritual Banquet**,
To behold their boundless compassion,
And to penetrate our earnest supplications with their radiant insight.

We, the subjects, hear the **True Transmission** of the **Ten Thousand Saints**,
And the **Supreme Three’s** solemn teachings,
Which prioritize **saving lives** and **preserving sacred life**,
And uphold the **orthodox Dharma** above all.

From the **Three Caverns’ Treasure Sutras**,
The **Arcane Intentions of All the Heavens**,
Some inwardly cultivate and close their vision,
Swallowing light to nurture the **Primordial Essence**;
Some refine **elixir** with **jade dew** and **jade frost**,
Using **five metals** and **nine cauldrons**;
Some **conserve the spirit** and **consume the qi**,
Restraining the **soul** and binding the **spirit**;
Some **ascend with steps** and **vanish their form**,
Hiding in the heavens and concealing beneath the earth.

All seek to prolong their finite existence,
And create the boundless beyond,
So that the **short-lived** may join the **long-lived**,
And the **morning mushrooms** may rank with the **great cypress trees**,
With all **thousand-gated virtuous beings** enticed to refine their essence.

Some, though foolish, grasp the **tale of capturing shadows**,
While the **superior sages** attain the **effect of diligent practice**,
Clarifying the essential teachings—both ancient and modern—
Which all must follow.

Now, the **Sacrificial Host** of the certain household,
By nature endowed with **orthodox truth**,
Aspires to the **profound mysteries**,
And comprehends the **principles of Dao/Way-body cultivation** and **generation**.
At the moment of their birth, when their **original sacred life** was first bestowed,
They now begin this **ritual assembly** of **burning incense**,
Devoting their minds to the **Ten Extremes**,
Prostrating before all the heavens,
And turning the **sutras** while praying for the **True Ones** and seeking blessings.

We, the subjects, accordingly gather and follow,
Adhering to the prescribed rituals,
And with sincerity, we pray to the **Supreme Three’s** boundless grace.

Humbly hoping that the **Supreme True Saints**,
The **Highest Exalted Ones** without limit,
May look down upon our petition,
And shower us with their **auspicious blessings**,
Granting us the **Vermilion Palace** and **Jade Gate**,
And the **Celestial Hall of Literary Splendor**.

May **Han Jun** open the **scroll of longevity**,
And **Sima Xi** record the **register of eternal life**.
May the **True Spirits** guard and protect,
And may **harmony** be our only resource.

The **right official** shall shorten the **scriptures of premature death**,
And the **left official** shall simplify the **calculations of extended life**.
May our **luck and lineage** be ever-broadened,
Our **sins and karmic debts** forever erased,
Our descendants and kin **prosper and content**,
And both the **living and the dead** **thrive in peace**.

We further pray for the **Ten Thousand Years of the Emperor**,
For the **Altars of Earth and Grain** to remain secure,
For distant lands and foreign courts
To share the same scriptures and follow the same paths,
For the **Three Lights** to shine brightly and long,
For the **Six Qi** to spread in perfect harmony,
For crops to flourish and **Dragon Spirits** to aid in their growth,
For no **diseases or epidemics** in the year,
For the people to live in **contentment and prosperity**,
And for the **Night Capital** and **Passage of the Dark Waters**,
The **Three Realms** and **Six Paths**,
To be blessed with the **extinguishing of suffering**,
And the **opening of the path by celestial light**,
So that all may emerge from darkness,
And be fully granted ascension and enlightenment,
Reaching the **Ten Extremes** and extending to the **Nine Enclosures**,
And all **sentient beings—mobile, stationary, and spiritual**—
May together ascend to the **Realm of Longevity**.

Above, we honor the **Great Heavenly Sovereign’s** boundless compassion,
Below, we fulfill our subjects’ **sacred life** of sincerity.

Respectfully submitted for your knowledge.
**Knowledge of the Ritual Bell**—the **Twelve Vows** are fulfilled.

The **Grand Lecture** commences—**preserving the spirit** while burning incense**.
The **High Functionary** restores the altar.

The **Incense Officials** and **Messengers**,
The **Dragon-Tiger Lords** to the left and right,
And the **Attendant Spirits** of the incense,
Shall direct us to the place where we previously ascended the platform in the evening assembly,
Where naturally arise **Golden Elixir** and **Lapis Lazuli Green**,
**Mushrooms and herbs**, and countless **spiritual beings**,
As the **True Ones** gather in assembly,
Right before this incense burner.

May all **Ten Directions’ Celestial Maidens and Immortal Boys**,
Attending with **orchid-scented incense**,
Transmit our previous supplications in earnest,
Swiftly reaching the **Supreme True Dao/Way** without limit,
The **Three Pure Ones** and **Three Realms** of the **Heavenly Sovereigns**,
The **August Heavenly Jade Emperor**,
The **Grand Sovereign of the Purple Forbidden Enclosure**,
And the **Great Emperor of the Northern Dipper**,
Before their **Celestial Court**.

**Ritual of Repentance and Expiation for Illness**
*Compiled and Edited by Master Guangcheng Du Guangting*

**Morning Dao/Way Practice on a Pure Dawn**
The ritual assembly ascends the platform as prescribed.

The **Grand Master** raises the **Ritual Bell**, and all disciples bow in reverence, holding their thoughts in accordance with the Dao/Way.
The **High Functionary** proclaims the **Soul-Guarding Incantation**, while **Pure Yang’s Radiance** shines forth, illuminating the sun’s return.
The **Divine Tiger** banishes malevolence, and **Flying Celestials** toll their bells.
**Wickedness is crushed, trials extinguished**—ten thousand demons are bound in form.
The **Nine Mysteries** restore the Dao/Way, and the **Eight Awe-Inspiring Powers** gather essence.
A thousand **Perfected Ones** register their presence, while the **Three Primordial Cycles** purge the pure.
The **Left Whistle** summons **Central Yellow**, and the **Right Baton** commands the **Six Ding**.
Through **Seven Revolutions and Eight Unions**, they circulate the **Heavenly Scriptures**.
The **Sacred Transformation** stands majestic, and the **Great Dao/Way** is set in motion.
**Auspicious Clouds** flow abroad, converging with the **Yellow Court**, harmonizing with the **True Dao/Way**.

The **Grand Master** raises the **Ritual Bell**, and the **Law-Drum** is struck **twenty-four times**.
The **High Functionary** ignites the furnace.

**Supreme Three Heavens’ Primordial Originator of the Three Qi**, **Most High Dao/Way Lord**, **Most High Venerable Laozi**—
Summon forth from within our bodies the **Three Five Functionaries**, the **Left and Right Official Envoys**, the **Left and Right Incense-Bearers**, the **Relay Dragon Mounted Officials**, the **Golden Boys Attending Incense**, the **Jade Girls Scattering Flowers**, the **Five Emperors’ Direct Symbols**, and the **Direct Sun Incense Officials**—each **thirty-six in number**—to emerge.

Those who emerge are clad in solemn, resplendent robes, their headgear adorned with trailing plumes.
They open the **Mysterious Platform’s Earthly Sovereigns and Territorial Spirits**.

Now, at this early court, ascending the platform to practice the Dao/Way, I humbly present my sincerest intentions.
All my earnest aspirations have been recorded and heard.
May the **Most High’s Ten Directions’ Supreme True Dao/Way Qi** and **Numinous Treasure Radiance** descend, flowing into our bodies,
So that my supplications may swiftly reach the **Supreme Limitless Dao/Way**, the **Three Pure Ones of Highest Sanctity**, and the **Heavenly Sovereign Emperor of Jade Sovereignty** before their Celestial Court.

The **Grand Master** raises the **Ritual Bell**, and the **Law-Position** is invoked.

We, **Position-Holding Officials** [here insert name] and the assembled ritual officers,
Humbly together present our sincere petition to:
**Primordial Heavenly Sovereign of Natural Spontaneity**, **Supreme Limitless Dao/Way’s Most High Dao/Way Lord**, **Most Holy Ancestor, Highest Dao/Way Sovereign of the Golden Threshold’s Primordial Heavenly Emperor**, **Most High Venerable Laozi**, **Highest Jade Sovereign**, the **Ten Directions’ Perfected Saints**, the **众至真 (Multitudes of Supreme Truths)**, the **诸君丈人 (Venerable Lords)**, the **Thirty-Six Heavenly Emperors**, the **Jade Emptiness Sovereign**, the **Great Sovereign**, the **East Hua, South Pole, West Spirit, North Truth, Mysterious Capital, Jade Capital, Golden Threshold, Seven Treasures, Mysterious Platform, Purple Micro’s Upper Palace**, the **Numinous Treasure’s Supreme True Manifest Dao/Way Lord**, the **Great Lawmaster of the Mysterious Core**, the **Three Heavens’ Great Lawmasters**, the **Upper Clarity, Sun-Moon, Nine Luminaries, Southern Asterism, Northern Dipper Star Sovereigns**, the **Three Officials and Five Emperors**, the **Nine Departments and Four Bureaus**, the **Moral-Dao Sovereigns within the Dipper**, the **Saintly Crowd of the Unbridled**, the **Sixty Heavenly Stems and Earthly Branches Natal Star Sovereigns**, the **Eastern Peak’s High Chancellor**, the **True Sovereign of Life’s Command**, the **Total Perfected King of the Western Extremity**, the **Mountain-Cave Perfected Immortals**, the **Three Realms’ Responsive Spirits**, and **All True Essences**.

I have heard that the **Wondrous Root of Spontaneity** establishes transformations through circumstances,
Crafting Heaven and Earth, containing the void’s essence.
The sun and moon thereby emit their light, and the **Heavenly Stem and Earthly Branch** take their positions.
The **Heavenly Primordial and Earthly Treasury** govern the **Yang Officials and Yin Attendants**, distributing myriad spirits to rule all beings.
To **remove calamities and bestow blessings**, the **River Chart’s** clear decrees were revealed;
To **repent transgressions and seek mercy**, the **Great One** established the **Expiatory Offerings**.

Our duty lies in **opening salvation and broadly aiding**—first among these is **relief for the afflicted**.
Whatever is petitioned must logically be reported.
How much more so when we receive imperial edicts—how dare we fail to present them?
**The Edict is Proclaimed.**

As the words state, our sincerity is **crimson and sincere**.
Your disciple [here insert name], seeing that **auspicious and inauspicious fortunes alternate**, that **cold and heat shift**, that **prosperity and adversity are not constant**, and fearing **disasters that cling like shadows**, dares to rely on Your benevolent teachings and prepare this ritual platform.

Following the **Yellow Register’s Numinous Treasure Simplified Chapters** and examining the **Mysterious Capital’s Canonical Models**, we hope that through this exposition, we may attain **responsive communion**.

Now, on this pure dawn, ascending the platform to practice the Dao/Way,
We request the **Law-Assembly** to kindle this **first incense-stalk** and offer it aloft.
May this incense-smoke ascend directly to heaven, **supplying the Supreme True Dao/Way Treasure**.
We **repent our bodies, repent our spirits, repent our fates**, prostrating our heads to the earth.

We rely upon the **Most High Three Sovereigns** and the **Ten Directions’ Multitudes of Saints**,
Wishing that the merit of this incense-stalk may flow into the **Imperial Diagram’s Grand Enterprise**,
The **Altar’s Sacred Spirits**, harmonizing with the Dao/Way without end, **aligned with Heaven and eternal**.
May the **Emperor’s Sacred Virtue** transcend the **Three Five**,
Spreading the Dao/Way throughout the **Nine Enclosures**;
May his **auspicious destiny** surpass **a hundred thousand years**,
Extending **non-action** across the **ten thousand realms**.

Now, we burn this incense and **humbly take refuge in the Dao/Way’s Perfected Saints and Supreme Truths**.
After attaining the Dao/Way, we shall **preserve Heaven’s longevity**, harmonizing with the **True Dao/Way**.

With this early court, ascending the platform to practice the Dao/Way,
We request the **Law-Assembly** to kindle this **second incense-stalk** and offer it aloft.
May this incense-smoke ascend directly to heaven, **supplying the Supreme True Scripture Treasure**.
We **repent our bodies, repent our spirits, repent our fates**, prostrating our heads to the earth.

We rely upon the **Most High Three Sovereigns** and the **Ten Directions’ Multitudes of Saints**,
Wishing that the merit of this incense-stalk may flow into **[household’s] Nine Mysterious Subtle Qi** and **a hundred kalpas’ karmic ties**,
Riding the **Primordial Sovereign’s Nine Celestial Petitions** to open the **Nine Abysses**;
Bearing the **Mysterious Sage’s Five Illuminations**, we shall **tranquilize the Five Sufferings**.
Blessings and misfortunes alike shall be preserved, and auspicious influence shall extend far and wide.

Now, we burn this incense and **humbly take refuge in the Scripture’s Perfected Saints and Supreme Truths**.
After attaining the Dao/Way, we shall **forever preserve longevity**, harmonizing with the **True Dao/Way**.

With this early court, ascending the platform to practice the Dao/Way,
We request the **Law-Assembly** to kindle this **third incense-stalk** and offer it aloft.
May this incense-smoke ascend directly to heaven, **supplying the Supreme True Master Treasure**.
We **repent our bodies, repent our spirits, repent our fates**, prostrating our heads to the earth.

We rely upon the **Most High Three Sovereigns** and the **Ten Directions’ Multitudes of Saints**,
Wishing that the merit of this incense-stalk may flow into **my person**,
So that the **Six Qi** may be harmonized and the **hundred passages** adjusted in order.
**Accumulated calamities and grievances** shall be washed away by Your grace;
**Stagnant illnesses and deep afflictions** shall be cleansed by the **Numinous Wind**.

「Midheaven bestows blessings, Southern Dipper extends years,
All kinsmen prosper, auspicious omens descend in secret.

Now, having kindled this incense, we rely upon the **Law-Assembly** and the **Most High Three Sovereigns**,
Ascending the platform to practice the Dao/Way, seeking the **Supreme True Master’s virtue/power**.
After attaining the Dao/Way, we shall forever preserve our essence, harmonizing with the **True and Perfect Dao/Way**.

We **repent our deeds, repent our fate, and threefold invoke the Dao/Way with threefold obeisance**.
We solemnly recite the **Law-Assembly’s sacred rank** again.

With **my person** and the assembled officials at the platform, we earnestly and sincerely petition:
The **Three Pure Ones**, **Ten Directions’ Multitudes of Saints**, the **two ranks of the Ritual Feast**,
And the **limitless array of holy beings**, humbly gazing upon Your vast compassion,
Piercingly descending, Your radiant discernment.

We, Your disciples, reflect upon the **origin of our primordial essence and spirit**,
The **commencement of our vital *qi***—countless *kalpas* since that day,
Until this present moment—**we have not understood karmic retribution**,
Nor recognized **causal connections** (*yinyuan*).
Our **threefold actions** have accumulated wrongs,
And the **six dusts** have piled afflictions,
Violating the **Heavenly Sovereign’s generative Dao/Way**,
Breaking the **Earthly Sovereign’s prohibitions and taboos**,
Impairing the **Four Seasons’ responsive functions**,
And losing the **nature of all things to fulfill their destiny**.
Thus, we have **harmed and killed**,
And **injured all sentient beings**—**unaware and ignorant**,
Accumulating infinite transgressions.

Our **past sins remain unrepented**, and **future crimes grow heavier**.
The **Three Officials and Five Emperors** record them in **black scriptures**,
While the **Taiyueh and Luocheng offices** mark them in **scarlet tablets**.
Perhaps due to **threefold fate’s malevolence and five agents’ suppression**,
Or **stars’ ill-omened conjunctions and divine retribution**—
Or because of **laborious toil, felling forests, transporting stones**,
**Hewing trees, excavating hills**, **disturbing dragon spirits**,
And **violating prohibitions and taboos**—
We have thus incurred **sickness and calamity**, yet **no cure has come**.
Our **true *qi*** is unbalanced, and the **Three Elements** are disordered.

Daring to rely upon the **ritual canons**, we establish this **Dao/Way altar**,
Pouring forth **sincere sincerity** below, and **praying to the Mysterious Saints** above,
For **infinite sins and offenses**—**all begging for repentance and absolution**.

We **humbly hope** that the **Multitudes of Saints** will descend their light,
And the **Ten Thousand Truths** will turn their gaze,
Flowing **great compassion’s grace** and bestowing **limitless mercy’s favor**,
Commanding the **Four Sovereigns** and **Nine Palaces** to:
For **my disciple’s person**, **erase the register of death**,
**Inscribe a new name in the celestial ledger**,
**Remove calamity and dispel disaster**,
**Harmonize grievances and resolve conflicts**,
**Cleanse past stains** and **level accumulated wrongs**.
The **stars’ ill-omened conjunctions** shall cease their influence,
And the **yearly *qi*’s suppressions** shall fade their retribution.
The **Blue Emperor** shall **extend his protective tally**,
**Recording liver and safeguarding soul**,
The **White Emperor** shall **transfer our name**,
**Quieting spirit and calming lungs**,
The **Star of Destiny** shall **guard our kidneys**,
And the **Mars Star** shall **settle our heart**.

The **Yellow Court True Person** shall **harmonize our spirit and preserve our organs**,
While the **Heavenly Physician** approaches from the east,
The **Grand Unity’s true essence**—**divine medicine hidden in reserve**—shall **descend as numinous dew**.
**Malevolent influences** shall dissolve at our will,
And **illnesses** shall vanish like mist.
**Blessings and longevity** shall eternally extend,
While **disasters and decline** shall utterly cease.

We pray that the **Emperors’ sacred diagram** endure forever,
And the **Saints’ virtue/power** shine resplendently,
That the **Four Seas** shall have no turmoil,
And the **Eight Strings** (*Eight Winds*) shall bring **great harmony**.
**Weapons** shall naturally be laid aside,
And **grain** shall flourish abundantly—
**The Sovereign** shall be **holy**, his **ministers loyal**,
And the **Heaven** and **Earth** shall be **serene and tranquil**.

Yet we also beg for **my disciple’s household**:
The **Nine Mysteries** to enjoy **blessings**,
The **Seven Ancestors** to attain **Heaven**,
The **Five Clans** to dwell in **peace**,
And the **Six Relatives** to live in **harmony**.
The **springs of the Nine Abysses** shall resound with **no voices of guilt**,
And the **Three Realms** shall merge, **Six Realms** renounce **the cycle of rebirth**.
**Flight and movement** shall be **stilled**,
And **sentient beings**—**all who know**—shall **partake in eternal life’s fruit**,
Together **drinking from the vast salvific grace**,
**All attaining the Dao/Way of enduring life**.

Above, we **manifest the Heavenly Sovereign’s boundless compassion**,
Below, we **fulfill our disciples’ repentance and gratitude**.

We **respectfully present this petition** to be heard.
*Knowing the ritual bell is struck, we offer twelve wishes.*

*The grand incantation is raised, and we preserve the spirit while kindling incense.*
*The High Functionary restores the furnace.*
The **Incense Officials and Heavenly Messengers**,
The **Left and Right Dragon-Tiger Sovereigns**,
And the **Attendant Spirits of the Incense**—
**Let them now attend at the place where we formerly ascended the platform to practice the Dao/Way**,
Where **golden nectar and emerald elixir** shall naturally arise,
**Mushrooms and herbs of a hundred blessings** shall flourish,
And the **Multitudes of Truths** shall gather here before this **incense furnace**.

We wish that the **Ten Directions’ Immortal Youths and Jade Maidens**,
**Shall receive the fragrant incense** and **transmit our sincere petition**,
Swiftly conveying it to the **Supreme True Master’s boundless Dao/Way**,
To the **Three Pure Ones’ Sacred Presence**,
And to the **Lord of Heaven, Jade Sovereign, and Imperial Sovereign** before them.

*Knowing the ritual bell is struck, we exit the hall to chant.*
*We leave the door and proceed to the Six-Muched Hall.*

**Complete, the *Daoquan* (Dao/Way Ritual Canons) in Volume Four.**
**Begun, the *Daoquan* (Dao/Way Ritual Canons) in Volume Five.**

「Master Guangcheng of Mr. Du Guangting’s Compilation
*Ritual of Repentance and Exorcism for Illness*
Midday Dao/Way Ritual—Procedures for Ascending the Platform as Prescribed.

The **Grand Lecturer** raises the ritual banner,
Each **officiant** pays homage to the **Master of the Hall** in accordance with the Dao/Way.
The **High Functionary** proclaims the **Sacred Talismans of the Spirit Guards**.

**Elixir Qi** ignites with crimson flames,
**Flame and mist** stir the winds in brilliance.
The **Red Wheel** rolls with mighty force,
**Heavenly light** shines upon the **Eight Deities of Destiny**.
**Threat advances, all-encompassing**, shifting and transforming across the **Ten Directions**.
**Golden Elixir descends**, dispelling malevolent spirits with no trace remaining.
**Evil is repelled, demons are shattered**—the **Original Virtue’s** radiance is manifest.
**Golden Talismans** summon and command,
**Cloud-riding banners** stir the **Dragon Officials**.
**Hymns and songs** celebrate the gathering,
**Scattered flowers** fill the **Great Void**.

The **Divine Transformation** proceeds auspiciously,
**The Four Quarters** stand in harmony.
**Submissive before the Imperial Sovereign**, none dare be disrespectful—
**In accord with the Dao/Way and True Master**.

The **Grand Lecturer** raises the banner,
**The Law Drum** is struck **twenty-four times**.
The **High Functionary** ignites the furnace.

**The Supreme Three Heavens’ Primordial Origin and Three Qi**,
**The True Master of the Boundless Dao/Way**,
**The Highest Dao/Way Lord**,
**The Great Saintly Ancestor, Most High Dao/Way Emperor of the Golden Gate, Primordial Origin**,
**The True Master of the Old Dao/Way**,
**The Most High Jade Sovereign**,
**All Ten Directions’ Perfected Saints**,
**The Multitudes of Truths**,
**The Noble Lords**,
**The Thirty-Six Heavenly Celestial Lords**,
**The Jade Void Emperor**,
**The Great Jade Emperor**,
**The Sovereigns of the Eastern Treasure, Southern Pole, Western Spirit, Northern Truth, Mystic Capital, Jade Metropolis, Golden Gate, Seven Treasures, Mystic Terrace, and Purple Micro**,
**The Lord of the Primordial Dao/Way, Illuminating and Supreme**,
**The Lords of Upper Clarity, Sun and Moon, Nine Luminaries, Southern Star, and Northern Dipper**,
**The Three Officials and Five Emperors**,
**The Nine Ministries and Four Departments**,
**The Moral Deities within the Dipper**,
**The Unrestrained Holy Multitude**,
**The Great Law Masters of the Mystic**,
**The Great Law Masters of the Three Heavens**,
**The Lords of the Sixty Heavenly Stems and Branches**,
**The Eastern Peak’s High Official**,
**The True Lord of Life and Death**,
**The General True King of the Western Extremity**,
**The Perfected Immortals of the Named Mountains and Cavern Palaces**,
**The Three Realms’ Responsive Deities**,
**All True Spirits**—

We have heard that the **Supreme Dao/Way** blends with **Truth**,
**Before Heaven’s** foundation is set, the **Original Virtue** stands alone—
**Divine Function** operates uniquely,
**Spiritual Transformation** subtly reveals itself.

It **spreads purity and impurity** through the **Two Principles**,
And **initiates the formation of all phenomena**.

Though **the Supreme Void** is boundless and distant,
**Sensations** are ever **communicative**.
Though **the Mystic Abyss** is profound and remote,
**Prayers** are never **unanswered**.

The **Holy Benevolence** descends to aid,
**Compassion** extends to all living beings.
Only when **devotion is sincere**,
Shall **illumination and protection** be **granted**.

We, the **officiants**, have long received **Clear Instructions**,
And **fulfilled our duties** as prescribed.
For **all sincere petitions**, it is **right** to **submit them**—
How much more so when **following Imperial Edicts**,
**Dare we not** present them?

**Proclamation of Petition**.

As the **words** declare,
**Our earnest sincerity** is **unmistakable**.

Your **disciple**, [name],
**Having transgressed the Five Constants**,
**Disrupted the Six Qi**,
**Bound by illness and misfortune**,
**Deeply troubled and in peril**—

Thus, moved by **the Dao/Way’s** profound resonance,
**Strengthened in the True Vehicle**,
**Piously contemplating the Pure Capital**,
**Aspiring to the Mystic Mirror**,
**Opening the Three Primordial Patterns**,
**Following the Nine Ritual Chants**,
**Establishing a Dao/Way Assembly**,
**Invoking the Perfected Saints’ descent**—

We, the **officiants**, **sincerely** lead and purify,
**Our bodies and minds**, in **harmony with Heaven’s Pattern**,
**Fast and perform rituals**,
**Bare our hearts and kneel in homage**,
**Submit to the Supreme Truth**,
**Cleanse our thoughts and light incense**,
**According to the Canon**—**presenting our petition**.

We **humbly hope** that the **Heavenly Sovereigns and Saints**,
**The Supreme Dao/Way Lords of the Eight Extremes**,
**The Ten Directions’ Transformative Masters**,
**The Three Pure Ones of the Three Realms**,
**All Earthly and Heavenly Deities**,
**The Lords of the Sun and Moon**,
**The Celestial Masters of Stars and Constellations**,
**The Mountains and Rivers, the Altars of the Peaks**,
**All Mighty Spirits**—

Shall **open their boundless compassion**,
**Descend their radiant response**,
**Turn their palanquins and pause their chariots**,
**Pity our earnest supplications**,
**Envelop us in their luminous blessings**,
**Affirm our profound sincerity**,
**Bestow vast merits and extraordinary blessings**,
**Grant them abundantly**—
**From the realm to the household**, **all shall share their grace**.

With today’s **Midday Dao/Way Ritual**,
We **invite the Law Assembly** to **kindle this first incense strand**,
**Wishing these fragrant vapors** to **ascend directly to the Supreme Dao/Way’s Treasure**.

We **submit our bodies, submit our spirits, submit our lives**,
**Prostrating our heads to the earth**.

**Relying upon the Supreme Three Sovereigns**,
**The Ten Directions’ Saints**,
**We pray** that the **merits of this incense strand**,
**May flow to the Spirits of the State and Altars**,
**To the Ancestors of the Dao/Way**,
**To the Divine Assembly of the Purple Palace**,
**To the Celestial Sovereign of the Green Origin**,
**To the Sacred Gathering at the Valley of Response**,
**To the Luminous Stars’ Dao/Way Performance**,
**To the **Great Treasure’s** abiding blessings**,
**To the **Imperial Diagram’s** enduring legacy**,
**To the **Pacification of the Seas and Peaks****, transmitting their fragrance**,
**To the **Pairing with Heaven and Earth****, ensuring eternal prosperity**.

**Thus, we burn incense**,
**Returning to the Dao/Way’s Sovereign and Perfected Saints**,
**Having attained the Dao/Way**, **forever preserved in harmony**—
**In accord with the Dao/Way and True Master**.

With today’s **Midday Dao/Way Ritual**,
We **invite the Law Assembly** to **kindle this second incense strand**,
**Wishing these fragrant vapors** to **ascend directly to the Supreme Dao/Way’s Scripture Treasure**.

We **submit our bodies, submit our spirits, submit our lives**,
**Prostrating our heads to the earth**.

**Relying upon the Supreme Three Sovereigns**,
**The Ten Directions’ Saints**,
**We pray** that the **merits of this incense strand**,
**May ascend to bless the present Emperor**,
**The **Dragon’s Diagram and Phoenix’s Pattern****,
**Ensuring his longevity**,
**The **Mystic Court and Yellow Chariot****,
**Granting him harmonious and enlightened virtue**.
**The Eight Seas shall witness his prosperity**,
**The martial banners rest**—
**His reign of peace** shall **extend like a sash**.」

**Now, in offering this incense,**
we humbly **return to the virtue of the Great Sage, the Most Authentic of the Eight Immortals and the True Dao,**
our **Teacher and Lord of Saints.**

**Having attained the Way,**
we **eternally preserve our true nature,**
**harmonizing with the Dao’s authenticity.**

**Repentance, command over demons, three invocations, three rites—**
**repeating the sacred rank.**
**We, the humble subjects—officiant [Name] and the assembled ritual officials—**
**sincerely unite in supplication to the Three Pure Ones, the Supreme Deities of the Ten Extremes,**
**the ritual assemblies of the Three Realms,**
**and the ranked saints of both classes,**
**reverently awaiting their boundless compassion**
**and their penetrating, luminous insight.**

**We reflect that the Most Holy have descended scriptures,**
**the Highest Truths have manifested transformations,**
**the Eight Precepts unfold their mysteries,**
**the Three Caverns radiate their light,**
**the grand rituals of Qingdu’s salvation and deliverance,**
**and the Yellow Register’s sacred scrolls for repentance and prayer—**
**our sincere hearts reach them,**
**and divine response is assured.**

**This disciple, [Name],**
**trapped in the dusty world, ensnared by worldly bonds,**
**with every thought entangled in mundane concerns,**
**has yet to align with the True Dao;**
**in conduct and body, we often stray from the Great Way.**
**Whether through past lives’ accumulated sins,**
**never encountering the Mystic Scriptures,**
**or entangled in deep guilt from the Six Emotions and Three Actions,**
**or lingering debts and ancient grudges,**
**we are now bound by fate’s retribution—**
**disasters and calamities plague our destiny,**
**illness and misfortune ensnare us,**
**the Six Palaces lose harmony,**
**the Hundred Passages remain unbalanced.**
**We ponder the fleeting nature of life,**
**our anxieties deepening.**

**Thus, we dare to lay bare our hearts,**
**establishing this fast to seek blessings,**
**following the sacred rites of the Spirit Immortals,**
**erecting the Eight Scenic Ritual Platform,**
**preparing incense and lamps with devotion,**
**and humbly offering repentance and gratitude.**

**May the Jade Pure Ten Saints and the Golden Gate Immortals**
**accept our sincere offerings,**
**bestowing celestial grace—**
**that the Long-Life Inspector may open the Dan Register to extend our years,**
**the Degree-over-Misfortune Deity restore the Purple Text to bring blessings.**
**May the Five Spirits be settled in the Five Viscera,**
**the Three Qi aligned in the Three Fields.**
**May the Southern Heaven bestow the Continuing Prosperity Talisman,**
**the Eastern Dipper record the Longevity Brand.**
**May the Northern Palace avert death,**
**the Western Bureau record our names,**
**our vital essence harmonized,**
**disasters and calamities extinguished,**
**earthly oaths unbroken,**
**watery pledges unviolated,**
**ghosts released from grudges,**
**humans freed from scheming.**
**May the stars move in auspicious paths,**
**no malevolent influences descending;**
**our natal star’s year pass without calamity or obstruction.**
**May the Mystic Elixir be secretly transmitted,**
**divine medicines granted—**
**rapidly healing, eternally secure.**
**The fast’s great blessings, the Yellow Register’s sacred efficacy—**
**above, honoring the Imperial Diagram, eternally prospering Heaven’s mandate;**
**below, benefiting the realm, ensuring lasting peace.**
**Externally, war ceases; internally, no sickness plagues.**
**The Nine Dark Nights and Six Realms’ beings**
**all share in the blessings of the Dao,**
**ascending to its shores.**
**Dragon spirits guard the land,**
**its boundaries thriving in ease,**
**the Dao’s wind of freedom bathing all in grace.**

**Above, we honor the Heavenly Venerable’s boundless compassion;**
**below, we fulfill our subjects’ sincere repentance.**

**Respectfully submitted.**

**The ritual bell is struck; the Twelve Vows are offered.**
**The Grand Lecture begins; incense is burned in reverence.**
**The High Functionary restores the furnace.**
**The Incense Officials, Dragon and Tiger Attendants, and the Auxiliary Spirit Officials—**
**command that where the disciple previously knelt in midday ritual,**
**golden elixir and jade-green pills shall spontaneously arise,**
**hundreds of numinous herbs flourish,**
**and the assembled Immortals gather before this incense furnace.**

**May the Celestial Children and Jade Maidens of the Ten Directions**
**attend the fragrant mists,**
**transmitting this disciple’s sincere supplications**
**directly to the Supreme, Boundless Dao of the Highest Truth,**
**the Three Pure Ones, the Celestial Jade Emperor—**

**Late Evening Dao Ritual for Expiation and Warding of Illness**
*Compiled and Edited by Master Guangting Du*

**Ritual Procedure:**
The late evening Dao ritual is performed as prescribed.
The Grand Master raises the ceremonial staff; all disciples pay homage in memory of the Master according to the law.
The High Functionary proclaims the Sacred Protection Incantation.

Five stars radiant, auspicious *qi* ascends in flight.
The Primordial One gathers the numinous—heaven and earth exchange their cycles.
Jade talismans and sacred seals are invoked; their commands pierce the unseen.
Fire is hurled, might is displayed—wickedness and malevolence are annihilated.
Ten thousand demons are subdued; chaotic forces dissolve.
Monstrous evils are crushed; Dao *qi* circulates universally.
Divine light illuminates the night; all obscurity is dispelled.
Ten thousand spirits descend in order; their banners ride the winds.
All living beings prosper; blessings spread across the land, harmonizing with the True Dao.

The Grand Master raises the staff; the law-drum is struck twenty-four times.
The High Functionary ignites the furnace.

**Invocation of the Celestial Host:**
The Most High Three Heavens’ Primordial Originator of the Three *Qi*,
The Supreme Dao Lord of the Void and the Boundless,
Summons forth from within our bodies the Three Five Functionaries,
Left and Right Officials and Messengers,
Left and Right Incense-Bearers,
Dragon-Courier Scribes,
Attendant Golden Boys,
Speaking Maidens who scatter flowers,
The Five Emperors’ Direct Talismans,
Direct-Sun Incense Officials—
Each thirty-six in number—
To emerge in resplendent attire, headdresses adorned with trailing plumes,
Opening the Mystic Altars of Heaven and Truth,
To urgently summon this land’s territorial and domainal spirits,
True Officials and Upright Gods,
To ascend and open the passways.

**Petition of the Disciple:**
This disciple, in the late evening ritual, ascending the altar to practice the Dao,
Humbly presents our sincere intentions—our deepest aspirations already recorded and heard.
We pray that the Supreme Dao’s ten-directional numinous *qi* and Sacred Treasure Light descend,
Flowing into our bodies, so that our supplications may swiftly reach
The Supreme, Boundless Dao of Highest Truth,
The Three Pure Ones, the Celestial Jade Emperor—
Before their august presence.

The Grand Master raises the staff; the law-position is proclaimed.

**The Petition of Officials and Assembled Daoists:**
We, officials of the rank [blank] and the gathered Daoist assembly,
Humbly unite in sincere supplication to:
The Primordial Heavenly Venerable of Natural Spontaneity,
The Supreme Dao Lord of the Boundless,
The Highest Ancestral Sage of the Golden Threshold’s Mystic Primordial Heavenly Emperor,
The Supreme Venerable Laozi,
The Highest Jade Emperor,
The Ten-Directional Perfected Saints,
All the Most True Ones,
The Thirty-Six Heavenly Sovereigns,
The Jade Void Supreme Emperor,
The Jade Emperor,
The Sovereigns of Eastern Clarity, Southern Polarity, Western Spirit, Northern Truth,
The Mystic Metropolis, Jade Capital, Golden Threshold, Seven Treasures, Mystic Platform, Purple Micro—
The Sacred Treasure Most True Clear Sovereign of the Dao,
The Celestial Lords of Sun, Moon, Nine Luminaries, Southern Asterism, Northern Dipper,
The Three Officials and Five Emperors,
The Nine Departments and Four Bureaus,
The Moral Worthies of the Central Dipper,
The Saintly Host of the Unbridled,
The Sixty Heavenly Stems and Earthly Branches of Native Stars,
The Great Lawmasters of the Mystic,
The Three Heavenly Lawmasters,
The Eastern Peak High Chancellor,
The True Lord of Life’s Command,
The Supreme Sovereign King of the Western Extremity,
The Perfected Immortals of Sacred Mountains and Caverns,
The Three Realms’ Responsive Spirits,
All True and Numinous Beings.

**The Disciple’s Declaration:**
We have heard that the Primordial One formed the cosmos,
The One Essence congealed the light—
Heaven and earth received their authority,
Yin and yang moved to generate and transform.
Prosperity and decline alternate; virtue and vice diverge.
The sun and moon have their cycles of decline;
Cold and heat follow their appointed courses.
Only this Great Dao unifies the seen and unseen,
Extending blessings and rest,
Broadly aiding all beings.

We have early explored the True Secrets, glimpsed the numinous diagrams.
The Three Caverns’ jade cases hold expiatory rites;
The Nine Heavens’ golden decrees transmit protective texts.
For four ten-thousands of kalpas, its teachings have flourished;
For five hundred millions of heavens, it has been venerated—
Subduing demons, summoning spirits,
Assisting the nation in its deeds,
Supporting the perilous and saving all things.
For any supplication made, how could it not be reported to the heavens?

**The Petition’s Words:**
As the words declare, the intent is sincere and devout.
This disciple, still bound by calamity and not yet freed from illness,
Prostrates before the heavens, baring our hearts to the Dao,
Requesting the elevation of this solemn fast,
That numinous power descend to aid us,
That our sincere offerings may meet with celestial favor.

With this late evening ritual, ascending the altar to practice the Dao,
We pray the assembled Daoists to light the first incense strand,
That this incense smoke may ascend directly to heaven,
Offering to the Most High True Dao Treasure.
We, disciples, prostrate body, spirit, and fate.
Relying on the Three Supreme Ones and the Ten-Directional Saints,
May the merit of this incense strand flow to the Emperor’s Nine Temples,
Illuminating the Three Pure Ones, blessing all lands,
Strengthening the august foundation, ensuring eternal prosperity.
We respectfully pray for the Crown Prince and all Princes,
That they may uphold the great enterprise.
And for our ministers and officials,
That they may assist in the wise designs,
With all under heaven in harmony, gathering like clouds and streams.

This incense is now burned; we take refuge in the Great Saints’ Most True Dao Virtue.
After attaining the Dao, we shall eternally preserve heaven’s longevity,
Harmonizing with the True Dao.

With this late evening ritual, ascending the altar to practice the Dao,
We pray the assembled Daoists to light the second incense strand,
That this incense smoke may ascend directly to heaven,
Offering to the Most High True Scripture Treasure.
We, disciples, prostrate body, spirit, and fate.
Relying on the Three Supreme Ones and the Ten-Directional Saints,
May the merit of this incense strand flow to our family’s seven ancestral and nine mystical lineages,
Freeing them from earthly bonds, ascending to celestial paths,
Ceasing all litigation in the netherworld,
Blessing our descendants with auspicious fortune.
The Nine Hells shall witness the radiant compassion;
The Six Realms’ beings shall together attain the realm of virtue.

This incense is now burned; we take refuge in the Scripture Saints’ Most True Dao Virtue.
After attaining the Dao, we shall eternally preserve longevity,
Harmonizing with the True Dao.

With this late evening ritual, ascending the altar to practice the Dao,
We pray the assembled Daoists to light the third incense strand,
That this incense smoke may ascend directly to heaven,
Offering to the Most High True Master Treasure.
We, disciples, prostrate body, spirit, and fate.

chunks.original_text: 仰依太上三尊，十方众圣，愿以是捻香功德，归流弟子某身，冤债和平，灾凶销解，邪衰冰泮，疾厄云收，南斗延生，东宫注禄。 洎诸眷属，普及人天，同享善功，咸臻道域。 今故烧香，自皈依师尊大圣众至真之德。 得道之后，永保平康，和与道合真。 忏方，命魔，三启，三礼。 重称法位。 具位臣某与醮坛官众等，谨同诚上启，三清上帝，十极高真，三界醮筵，两班列圣，恭望洪慈，洞回昭鉴。 臣等参佩宝文，夙渐灵泽，窃披玄奥，志在敷扬，思立善功，广被群品。 弟子某灾凶在运，疾厄所缠，列款表心，虔诚祷福，请崇斋直，关奏真灵。 是敢遵按典仪，转经行道，忏谢弟子某前生今世，宿罪深尤。 或违天地覆载之仁，或亏日月照临之德，犯二气五行之性，伤三光六纪之和。 前冤未除，后罪重结，故杀误伤，肆意任心，不识因缘，罔知忌讳。 六情所起，干犯幽明； 三业所为，负越经训。 成兹报对，构此灾危。 又恐犯触龙神，兴工土木，侵伤地理，违爽天时。 又恐宿曜所临，年运所犯，九宫刑克，八卦冲妨。 疾厄既深，忧危是切。 敢因启斋设款，忏谢过愆，烧香然灯，祈天请命，灾殃罪咎，戚乞忏除，使太一延生，三元却死，灵童投药，大帝降符，六府调和，百关宣畅，寿延禄永，祸灭福生。 弟子某家，九祖生天，六亲蒙佑，九幽六趣，动植飞沉，各遂所宜，咸承福利。 上愿龙图鸿业，地久天长，文德允修，武功遐着。 川浮圣泽，日并睿明。 八卦九畴，再彰於清洛； 连珠合璧，重睹於玄穹。 百谷无愆，三农有积，疵疠不作，水旱无侵，风雨以时，干戈永戢，遍该含识。 下及幽途，川岳职寮，阴阳臣佐，诛邪助正，弘道安人，齐契道阶，俱升福岸。 则上明天尊大慈之泽，下副臣等忏谢之诚。 谨启以闻。 知磬举，十二愿。 都讲举，存神烧香。 高功复炉。 香官使者、左右龙虎君、侍香诸灵官，当令臣向来晚朝升坛行道之所，自然生金液丹碧，芝英百灵，众真交会，在此香火炉前。 当愿十方仙童玉女，接侍兰烟，传臣向来所启之诚，速达径御至真无极大道、三清上圣、昊天玉皇上帝御前。 知磬举，出堂颂。 出户，引至六幕堂。 道门科范大全集卷之六竟 道门科范大全集卷之七

With reverence, we take refuge in the Most High Three Sages,
And the Ten Directions’ holy assemblies.
May the merit of this incense strand flow to disciple [name],
Clearing debts and settling grievances,
Dissolving calamities and disasters,
Quelling malevolence and dispelling evil,
Healing sickness and dispelling misfortune,
Extending life through the Southern Dipper’s grace,
And bestowing prosperity through the Eastern Palace’s decree.

Thus extending to all kin and kindred,
And all beings of heaven and earth,
Together sharing in virtuous merit,
All ascending to the Dao’s realm.

Now, with this incense burned, we take refuge in the Teacher-Saints’ Most True Dao Virtue.
After attaining the Dao, we shall eternally preserve peace and well-being,
Harmonizing with the True Dao.

Repentance offered, demonic influences subdued,
Three invocations, three obeisances.
Reaffirming the sacred rank.

With sincerity, we—disciple [name] and the ritual officials—
Humbly present our heartfelt supplication to the Three Pure Ones and Supreme Deities,
The Ten Extremes’ High Immortals,
The Three Realms’ ritual assembly,
And the Two Classes of Arrayed Saints,
Beseeching their boundless compassion to pierce through and illuminate our devotion.

We, disciples, have long worn the sacred texts’ blessings,
Unveiling mysteries profound, striving to propagate virtue,
Establishing merit to benefit all beings.

Disciple [name], burdened by calamities and afflicted by misfortune,
List our transgressions with sincerity, earnestly praying for blessings,
Requesting the ritual’s rectification and the True Ones’ intercession.

Thus, we dare follow the prescribed rites,
Turning the scriptures and practicing the Dao,
Repenting for disciple [name]’s past and present lives,
Deep-seated sins uncountable—
Either defying Heaven and Earth’s nurturing benevolence,
Or failing to honor the Sun and Moon’s illuminating virtue,
Violating the nature of the Two Qi and Five Phases,
Disrupting the harmony of the Three Lights and Six Seasons.

Past grievances unresolved, future sins accumulating,
Taking life recklessly, acting without restraint,
Ignorant of cause and effect, heedless of taboos.
The passions’ stirrings offend both seen and unseen,
The three actions’ deeds transgress sacred teachings.
Thus, we incur retribution, inviting disaster and peril.

Again, we fear provoking Dragon spirits,
Undertaking earthworks and construction,
Encroaching on geomantic harmony,
Or defying the seasons’ natural order.
Again, we fear the influence of celestial portents,
Yearly cycles of misfortune,
The Nine Palaces’ penal influences,
And the Eight Trigrams’ conflicting obstacles.

Sickness and misfortune deepen, danger pressing near—
We dare invoke the ritual, repent our transgressions,
Burn incense and light lamps,
Praying to Heaven and beseeching fate,
That calamities and sins may be absolved,
So that the Primordial One may extend life,
The Three Elements may reverse death,
Spirit-children may administer remedies,
The Great Emperor may descend with talismans,
The Six Ministries may harmonize,
And the Hundred Passages may flow freely,
Bestowing longevity and prosperity,
Extinguishing misfortune and nurturing blessings.

May disciple [name]’s household ascend to the Nine Ancestors’ celestial realm,
With all kin receiving protection,
The Nine Hells and Six Realms’ beings—
All creatures, flying, swimming, or rooted—
Each attaining their rightful place,
All sharing in blessings and fortune.

Above, we pray for the Dragon’s grand design to endure,
Heaven and Earth to last eternally,
Cultural virtue to flourish and martial prowess to resonate far,
The sacred waters bearing virtue, the sun’s brilliance encompassing all.
The Eight Trigrams and Nine Regions shall again shine in the Pure Luo,
Pearls and jade reunite in the Mystic Vault.
The hundred grains shall yield without fail, the three agricultural labors prosper,
No epidemics shall arise, floods and droughts shall not intrude,
Winds and rains shall come in season, arms shall forever rest,
All sentient beings included.

Below, even the spirits of the underworld,
River and mountain officials,
Yin and Yang ministers—
Punishing evil and aiding the righteous,
Propagating the Dao and bringing peace,
Ascending together to the Dao’s shore—
Thus, above we honor the Heavenly Sage’s boundless compassion,
Below we fulfill our disciples’ sincere repentance.

Humbly presented for divine acknowledgment.

The ritual bell is struck; the Twelve Vows are proclaimed.
The Grand Lecture commences; the spirit is focused, incense is burned.
The High Functionary restores the altar.
The Incense Officials and Messengers—
Left and Right Dragon-Tiger Lords,
Attendant Spirit Officials—
Shall now command that where disciple [name] has ascended the evening altar to practice the Dao,
Golden elixirs and emerald jade shall spontaneously arise,
Mushrooms and hundred-spirits’ herbs flourish,
And the assembled Immortals gather before this incense burner.

May the Ten Directions’ celestial maidens and immortal youths
Attend to the fragrant smoke,
Transmitting disciple [name]’s sincere supplications
Directly to the Supreme Dao’s Unbounded Extremity,
The Three Pure Ones and Most High Saints,
And the Jade Emperor of the Celestial Vault.

The ritual bell is struck; the hymns are chanted.
Exiting the hall, led to the Six-Curtained Chamber.

**The Ritual of Starry Exorcism for Disaster Elimination**
*Compiled and Edited by Master Guangcheng Du Guangting*

**Opening the Altar and Practicing the Dao**

Conduct the ritual as prescribed. The Grand Master presides, and all disciples observe the precepts in accordance with the Dao.

The High Functionary proclaims the Sacred Exorcism Charm.

**East Direction:**
Nine-*qi* Azure Heaven, the Bright Star Great Deity.
Illuminating the eastern lands, piercing the Nine Gates.
Turning the torch of yang light, sweeping away filth and miasma.
The Radiant Boy, named **Xuanqing**.
Guarding my hall, facing the Celestial Sovereign.
Subduing demons, binding fiends, hunting the wicked horde.
Upholding the True Dao, with crimson script and jade inscriptions.
Nine-Heaven talismans command, seizing the Dragon-Courier’s transmission.
All-under-Heaven pacified—I attain the Flying Immortal,
Harmonizing with the Dao, uniting with the True.

**South Direction:**
Three-*qi* Vermilion Heaven, radiant effulgence flowing.
The Wandering Star turns the torch, piercing the Great Sun.
Above, the Vermilion Pure One, contracting with the Void Sovereign.
The Radiant Boy, named **Huafang**.
Commanding the Fire Soldiers, guarding the Jade Hall.
Severing evil, binding fiends, beheading the demon kings.
What the North Emperor receives, wind and fire cannot withstand.
The flowing bells resound, aiding in the altar’s defense.
The True Dao spreads—who dares to rage?
I enjoy the supreme merit, seated upon the Pole Star’s might.
Eons without end, boundless as Heaven—I harmonize with the Dao, uniting with the True.

**West Direction:**
Seven-*qi* Pure Heaven, the Great White flows its essence.
Illuminating the Golden Gate, piercing the Great Darkness.
Within, the Pure Sovereign, named **Imperial Spirit**.
Guarding the spirit, pacifying my form.
Severing the source of evil, the Kingly Dao made clear.
Palaces in order, the Three Lights aligned.
The Dao unites naturally—I ascend to the Purple Court.
Sacred Talismans bless all beings.
The Primordial Sovereign’s *qi* comes to merge with my body.
Merit surpassing all—Heaven and Earth both at peace.
I harmonize with the Dao, uniting with the True.

**North Direction:**
Five-*qi* Dark Heaven, the Primordial Wandering.
The Star of the Hour shines resplendent, illuminating the Great Microcosm.
The Dark Spirit Venerable Deity, named **Cengwei**.
Commanding the Flying Crown, celestial robes and feathered garments.
Guarding the Five Gates, inspecting and capturing malefactors.
Who dares to trespass—cleaved and shattered.
The Jade Talisman declares, the Eight Sacred Powers.
Evil gates sealed, the True Dao opened.
Reflecting upon my form, the Three Lights shine as one.
Riding the void, floating—my form ascends as an Immortal.
I harmonize with the Dao, uniting with the True.

**Central Direction:**
One-*qi* Yellow Heaven, regulating Heaven and Earth.
Forging yin and yang, commanding the Mysterious True.
The Star of Pacification emits its radiance, flowing through the Nine Heavens.
The Radiant Boy, named **Tianlian**.
The Primordial *qi*, yang essence—flames rise as crimson smoke.
Piercing all under Heaven, and my disciples’ bodies.
A hundred evils crushed, ten thousand ghosts slain.
The Central Mountain’s spell—all under Heaven obeys.
The Five Spirits pacified—I fly as a High Immortal.
I harmonize with the Dao, uniting with the True.

The Grand Master raises the ritual drum **twenty-four times**.
The High Functionary ignites the furnace.

**Invocation of the Supreme Three-Heaven Primordial Three-*qi*,
The Most High Dao Sovereign,**
Commanding forth from within my body the **Three Five Functionaries**,
Left and Right Officials, Left and Right Incense-Bearers,
Dragon-Courier Mounted Attendants, Incense-Bearing Golden Boys,
Flower-Scattering Jade Maidens, the Five Emperors’ Direct Talismans,
Direct-Day Incense Officials—**thirty-six each**—to emerge.

Those who emerge are attired in splendid robes, caps with trailing ribbons,
Opening the Mysterious Altar’s land and territorial spirits.

I, your humble disciple, having fasted and offered sincere supplications,
Now establish the altar in ritual play, humbly declaring my intent.
My heartfelt sincerity is fully recorded in the petition.

With today’s invocation of the altar and arrangement of positions,
All offerings displayed, the assembly solemn and without disturbance,
The True Ritual performed with solemnity—
The celestial omens align, auspicious clouds gather.
With utmost devotion, my sincerity ascends to the highest realms.
May all above and below Heaven hear and know.

chunks.original_text: 愿得太上至真道炁，灵宝慧光下降，流入臣等身中，令臣所启之诚，速达径御至真无极大道、三清上圣、昊天金阙玉皇上帝御前。 都讲举，请称法位。 具位臣某与临坛列职官众等，谨同诚上启，大罗九皇至尊，十方上圣，三界应感，一切真灵。 臣闻天不佑于鲜 德，内尽情而可以动穹极之尊； 士不崇於匪仪，外尽文而可以举仙科之秘。 惟致情文之谨，乃蒙真圣之临。 况三箓重黄箓之仪，而九坛贵黄坛之盛。 今则恭祓丛楹之秘，肃开华谕之场。 旗猎天风，召五方之真气； 剑横北斗，净千里之妖氛。 众香馥以扬烟，法鼓琅而振响，俨洪规而肇始，励众志以惟寅。 吟空洞谣歌之章，延上圣高尊之驭，大敷张於斋格，用忏洗於罪根。 伏愿凡悃遥通，帝心下降，诞形丕应，洞察至诚。 先遣监斋监醮真官，侍经侍香仙媛，传言玉女，奏事金童，来临圭洁之场，共领忱情之祷，证明法事，周洽愿心。 然后玉羽群翔，驻鸾骖於静夜； 翠华咸建，肆玉轪於层空。 或乘胎化之仙禽，或驾飞云之天驷，纷然来格，敢不钦承，启兹玄感，上御至真无极道前。 知磬举，起敬赞。 唱十方。 礼足，各长跪皈命忏悔。 臣法众等，志心皈身、皈神、皈命十方无极大道，太上灵宝天尊，恭望洪慈，洞垂巨泽，普降洪恩。 臣闻尽天下之物，不足以交神明； 修胸中之诚，斯可以应天地。 矧乃玄元之教，莫非清净之门。 傥三业六根之过存，岂一纯二精之能格。 当斋科之谨始，欲尘虑以先除。 庶藉宣扬，以伸昭格。 伏念臣与醮主某，自从旷劫，乃至今生，三业根深，十恶障重。 有妙湛之体，为情所昏； 有虚明之用，为物所蔽。

「May the **Supreme Dao/Way of the Most High and Ultimate Truth** descend with its **mystic light of spiritual treasure** and **enlightened radiance**,
Flowing into the bodies of your humble disciples,
That the sincerity of my invocation may swiftly reach the **Direct Sovereign Dao/Way of Ultimate Truth and Boundlessness**,
The **Three Pure Ones of Supreme Holiness**, and the **Celestial Gate of Golden Threshold—Jade Emperor, the Most High Sovereign** before whom they reside.

**All assembled officials** now convene, and I humbly request the **proclamation of sacred ranks**.
With all ranks present—your humble disciple **Certain** and the **ritual officials gathered at the altar**—
We together offer our sincerity to the **Nine Sovereigns of Great Dao/Way**,
The **Supreme Saints of the Ten Directions**, the **Three Realms of responsive virtue**,
And all **true and enlightened spirits**.

Your humble disciple hears that Heaven does not favor those lacking **virtue/power**,
Yet when inner sincerity is exhausted, it can move the **august and exalted**—the **Emperor of the Highest Extremes**.
The **virtuous** do not revere those without **proper ritual conduct**,
Yet when outer propriety is perfected, it can unlock the **secrets of ascension**.

Only through the utmost devotion to **sincerity and ritual** can one receive the **presence of the True Saints**.
Moreover, the **Three Talismans of the Yellow Talisman Ritual** are honored,
And the **Nine Altars** revere the **grandeur of the Yellow Altar Ritual**.

Now, with reverence, I purify the **hidden halls of the sacred grove**,
And solemnly open the **field of refined edicts**.
Flags flutter with **celestial winds**, summoning the **true qi of the Five Directions**;
Swords strike across the **Northern Dipper**, cleansing **thousand-li demons and malevolent influences**.

Incense burns fragrant, rising in **pious smoke**;
The **sacred drum** resounds, its **clear and resonant** tones echoing.
With **solemn discipline**, we commence this **great ritual**,
And exhort the **unified resolve** of all participants.

We recite the **hymns of the Celestial Caverns**,
And invoke the **high and exalted** **Supreme Saints** to descend.
We **spread out the sacred space** in accordance with the **fasting rules**,
And **purify through repentance**, washing away the **roots of sin**.

Humbly, we pray that all **sincere and distant** voices be heard,
That the **Emperor’s heart** descend in response,
And that the **manifest form** of his grace be abundantly shown,
Piercing our **ultimate sincerity**.

First, we dispatch the **True Officials overseeing the fast and ritual**,
The **Celestial Maidens attending scriptures and incense**,
The **Transmitting Speech Jade Maidens**,
The **Golden Boys presenting petitions**,
To come and **temple at this spotless field**,
Together leading our **heartfelt prayers**,
To **verify the ritual** and **fulfill our wishes** in harmony.

Then, **jade and feathered spirits** gather in flight,
And the **cranes rest in pairs** beneath the **still night**;
**Emerald banners** are raised in all directions,
And the **sacred chariots of jade** spread across the **layered heavens**.
Some ride upon **transcendent beasts of celestial birth**,
Others drive **heavenly steeds of flying clouds**—
In **swirling multitude**, they descend to this solemn assembly.
How dare we not **reverently accept** their presence,
And **awaken this mystical response**,
So that they may **ascend before the Ultimate Dao/Way of Boundless Truth**!

**Know the sacred bell is struck**,
And **rise in respectful praise**.
**Chant the Ten Directions**!

When the **rites are complete**, all **prolong kneeling** in **repentance and submission**,
Your humble disciple and the **ritual participants**,
With **devoted hearts**, bowing to the **Ten Directions of the Boundless Dao/Way**,
The **Supreme Dao/Way of the Most High and Mystic Treasure**,
Humbly **gazing upon the Great Mercy**,
And **piercing the vast compassion**,
That **universal grace** may descend.

Your humble disciple hears that all **things under Heaven** are insufficient to **exchange with the divine**,
Yet **cultivating sincerity within the heart** can **respond to Heaven and Earth**.
How much more so for the **teachings of the Primordial Mystic**,
Which are all **paths of purity and clarity**!
If **the three karmas and six roots** of **offenses remain unchecked**,
How could one **pure in body and twofold in spirit** attain this?

At the **commencement of this strict fast**, we **first dispel dusty thoughts**.
May this **propagation and exposition** bring forth **illuminated virtue**.

Humbly, we reflect that your disciple **Certain** and the **ritual master**,
Since the **vast eons** and until this life,
Have **deep-rooted karmas** and **tenfold sins** as heavy obstacles.
Though we possess **wondrous and tranquil essence**,
We are **bewildered by passions**;
Though we hold **clear and luminous faculties**,
We are **obscured by worldly attachments**.

chunks.original_text: 傥率励於翘勤，必导迎於景贶。 臣等式循科法，备举明科，坛开预夕之严，词吐中情之切。 上资家国，普济幽明。 先期斋范之行，淑载真庭之启，驿龙上奏，羽盖分驰，鉴神壝之。 权舆示天，威於咫尺。 保全厘事，将覃及於人天； 克举熏修，庶雄成於志愿。 披诚伊始，颓祉有初，弟子词诚，谨当宣示。 宣词。 谛详词语，灼见至诚。 罄纯意以弥勤，望真斿而乃睠。 霞裾旅集，云篆数披，缛坛款剑佩之临，玉戺转旌幢之影。 俨珍馐而侑供，酌醴虡以交神。 锺虡奏音，与信词而并发； 炉香腾气，随馨德以升闻。 谅冥感之交通，获上灵之昭应。 臣等备员摄事，按式宣科，先取阴时说戒，以今建坛为始，敷行法事。 伏乞太上三尊，十方众圣，玄中大法师，应感真灵，勑勒监斋曹属、土地真官，载肃威神，式严坛宇，用徯云骈之集，以迎天仗之来，使邪秽荡除，埃氛远隔，宇宙澄寂，八风不翔。 令臣等神气不迁，思念□感，启奏上达，成就斋功。 须明且清晓，依法行道，续以启闻。 发愿。 都讲举，存神烧香。 高功复炉。 香官使者、左右龙虎君、侍香诸灵官，当令臣向来宿启建坛之所，自然生金液丹碧，芝英百灵，众真交会，在此香火炉前。 当愿蚁诚上达，凤辇下临，察其五蕴之情，毕乃一坛之愿，使灾不生而祸不作，寿弥久而福弥昌，厥子厥孙，转荣转贵，十方仙童玉女，接侍兰烟，传臣向来所奏之诚，速达径御至真无极大道、三清上圣、昊天金阙玉皇上帝御前。 知磬举，出堂颂。 出户，引至六幕堂。
chunks.translated_text:
The servants, with zeal and earnestness, shall surely be guided to meet with **auspicious blessings**.

We, the ministers, follow the prescribed rites and laws,
Presenting clear and solemn rituals,
Opening the altar with the solemnity of evening’s vigil,
Speaking with heartfelt sincerity.

We seek to benefit the realm and family,
To universally aid both the living and the departed.
We begin with the **preliminary fasting and purification**,
And the **auspicious opening of the True Hall**,
As the **Celestial Dragon** ascends its petition,
And the **feathered banners** scatter in procession—
May the **Divine Spirit** behold us.

The **Sacred Chariot** demonstrates Heaven’s will,
Its power near at hand.
May we preserve and perfect all matters,
That both humans and celestial beings may be enriched;
May we achieve and refine our **cultivation and merit**,
That our aspirations may flourish and be fulfilled.

With sincerity now revealed, blessings take root,
And the disciples’ words are earnestly declared.
**The Declaration is spoken.**

Examine the words with clarity,
See the sincerity within.
Exhaust all pure intentions to redouble our efforts,
And gaze upon the **True Dao** until enlightenment dawns.

Gathered in the **crimson robes**, the assembly converges,
The **cloud-seals** unfold in number,
The **ornate altar** stands as **swords and girdles** draw near,
The **jade halberds** turn with the **banners’ shadows**.

Reverently presenting the **precious offerings** as tribute,
We pour the **sacred wine** to commune with the spirits.
The **bell and incense** resound in harmony,
As the **sincere words** are uttered in unison;
The **incense’s qi** ascends with the **virtue’s fragrance**.

Thus, the **dark and luminous** are in communion,
And the **Highest Spirits** respond with manifest grace.

We, the ministers, having assembled and taken our roles,
Follow the rites to proclaim the **sacred formulas**,
First invoking the **yin-time precepts**,
Taking today’s altar-opening as the commencement,
And proceeding with the **lawful rites**.

We humbly pray to the **Supreme Three Venerables**,
The **Ten Directions’ Holy Assembly**,
The **Playground of the Mystic Middle**’s Grand Master,
The **Responsive True Spirits**—
Commanding the **Supervising Officials of the Fasting Bureau** and the **Earthly Officials**,
To solemnly array the **Awe-Inspiring Spirits**,
To strictly consecrate the **altar’s precincts**,
That the **cloud-hosts may gather in ranks**,
And the **Heavenly Ensigns** may arrive,
So that **evil and impurity may be purged**,
And the **dust and miasma** kept far away,
That the cosmos may be serene and still,
And the **Eight Winds** cease to stir.

May our **spirit and qi** remain steadfast,
Our thoughts ever **sensitive to response**,
Our petitions ascending to the Highest,
Our **fasting merits** fully accomplished.

At dawn’s clarity and morning’s purity,
We proceed according to the **Law** and the **Way**,
Continuing to present our petitions.

**The Vow is made.**

The **Grand Assembly** is convened,
The **spirit is focused**, incense is burned.
The **High Functionary** restokes the incense burner.
The **Incense Officials and Messengers**, the **Left and Right Dragon-Tiger Lords**, and the **Attendant Spirits of Incense**—
Let it be that at the very place where we have previously established the altar,
**Golden Elixir and Azure Jade** shall naturally arise,
**Mushrooms and Hundred Spirits** flourish,
The **Multitudes of True Ones** gather here before this incense burner.

May our **ant-like sincerity** ascend to the Highest,
And the **Phoenix Palanquin** descend in response,
Examining the **Five Aggregates of our devotion**,
Fulfilling the **entire altar’s wish**,
That **disaster not arise** and **calamity not take root**,
That **longevity may extend** and **blessings multiply**,
That our **descendants and their descendants** may turn to ever-greater honor and nobility,
And that the **Ten Directions’ Celestial Children and Jade Maidens**,
Attending in the **orchid mist**,
May transmit our previously declared sincerity
Swiftly to the **Supreme, Boundless, Great Dao**,
The **Three Pure Ones, Most Holy**,
Before the **August Heaven’s Golden Gate, Jade Sovereign Emperor of Heaven**.

The **metal chimes** are struck,
The **praise is chanted in the hall**.

Exit the hall,
Lead to the **Six-Curtain Pavilion**.

chunks.original_text: 道门科范大全集卷之七竟 道门科范大全集卷之八 广成先生杜光庭删定 消灾道场仪 设醮行道 都讲举，各礼师存念如法。 高功宣卫灵咒。 五星列照，焕明五方。 水星却灾，木德致昌。 荧惑消祸，太白辟兵。 镇星四据，家国利亨。 名刊玉简，字录帝房。 乘飙散景，飞腾太空。 出入冥无，游宴十方。 五云浮盖，招神摄风。 役使万灵，上卫仙翁，和与道合真。 都讲举，鸣法鼓二十四通。 高功发炉 无上三天玄元始三炁，太上老君，召出臣等身中三五功曹，左右官使者，左右捧香，驿龙骑吏，侍香金童，传言散花玉女，五帝直符，直日香官使者，各三十六人出。 出者严装显服，冠带垂缨，关启此间土地、方域神真。 臣今设醮朝修，谨奏为入意，其诸丹悃，具载疏文，愿得太上十方正真生炁，灵宝瑞光下降，流入臣等身中，令臣所奏之诚，速达径御至真无极大道、三清上圣、昊天金阙玉皇上帝御前。 都讲举，请称法位。 具位臣某与合坛官众等，谨同诚上启，虚无自然元始天尊，太上玉晨大道君，太上金阙老君，太上昊天玉皇上帝，九皇至尊，十方灵宝天尊，诸天大帝，三十六部尊经玄中大法师，上相上宰，上保上傅，三官五帝，十一大曜星君，十神太一真君，南斗六司真君，北斗七元星君，周天乾象二十八宿，十二宫神，三百六十五度诸天列宿，本命元辰，天曹职司，九天真宰，三山五岳、福地靖庐、厚地洞宫、岳渎主宰，三界应感，一切真灵。 臣闻玉天严远，难升浩劫之家； 金洞渺清，徒仰素灵之馆。 奥尊帝而在上，握化纪以居中。 启十方无碍之心，应物而动； 号三界大慈之父，视人如伤。 俯仰郁罗之台，卷舒投芥之劫。 回瞻万兆，悲晋晷之蜉蝣； 俯盻九尘，叹汉宫之蝼蚁。 自惟下俗，分绝仙阶，益凭受着之科，详罄精微之恳。 今有某严持信币，密款仙庭，冀天鉴之下观，察尘情之片善。 伏愿九清至圣，离曲密之华宫； 十极元皇，从飞虚之法驾。 百亿天丁，后辔丹飙； 千二官君，前迎翠辈。 掷火万里，下呼阳而召阴； 旋香三轮，上出日而入月。 极东游於炽水，尽西景於虞汧，南造朱陵之宫，中盘黄凝之府，北尽夜城之阙，下殚丘寒之泉。 至於鲁称教父，由太极之从行； 西号世尊，自延真而密侍。 元始符命，畴敢不祇，俯倾心请之诚，仰望云临之驾。 臣等与斋官某，无任钦坤之至，稽首顿首再拜，奉迎圣驾。 降两班圣位。 三界众真，醮筵列圣，向伸拜请，谅沐光临。 请各整於仙班，共祇迎於帝驭。 降帝，云舆。 鸾舆至止，鹤驾临轩，与醮列真，如仪朝礼。 朝礼既周，请升醮席，礼官　　上香，设拜初进酒。 知磬举，散花，奏乐。 具位臣某与临坛官众等，谨重诚上启，三清上圣，宝界真灵。 窃以一元布景，本无高下之私； 万兆肖形，尽育清和之炁。 既死生之寝远，遂好恶之森繁。 秽身纵溺於沉迷，大道每垂於善贷。 或罪根之弥甚，虑阴责之潜加。 苟悟百非，即消万祸。 今弟子某识神冥滞，营魄震惊，由浩劫以沦胥，亡元灵而奔躁。 不攀觉树，乐登於炎锋； 不契真庭，甘焚於火宅。 六曹纵逸，三业缠绵。 迪惟高圣之宣慈，大庇含生而开度。 今弟子某皈道自首，祈天博容。 伏乞至圣上灵，高真大帝，垂恩度厄，锡命除殃。
chunks.translated_text:
The **Dao/Way Gate’s Complete Rules and Rituals**, Volume Seven concluded,
Volume Eight begins: **Master Guangcheng Du Guangting’s** edited and refined **Rituals for Disaster Elimination**—
**Setting the Jiao/Expiation Ritual** and **Performing the Dao/Way**.

The **Grand Master** raises the **Assembly of the Dao/Way**,
Each **officiant** and **disciple** observes the **Precepts** with reverence, as prescribed.

The **High Functionary** proclaims the **Soul-Guarding Incantations** of the **Five Stars**,
Their **illumination** shines forth across the **Five Directions**—
**Water Star** repels disasters, **Wood Virtue** brings prosperity.
**Mars** dissipates calamities, **Jupiter** wards off armies.
**Venus** steadies the four quarters, **benefiting** both **family and state**.
Their **names** are inscribed on **jade tablets**, their **words** recorded in the **Celestial Archives**—
**Riding the gusts** and **scattering the mists**, they **soar through the boundless void**,
**Entering and exiting the unseen realms**, they **roam and feast** across the **Ten Directions**.
The **Five Clouds** rise as their canopy, **summoning gods** and **subduing winds**,
**Commanding all spirits**, they stand guard before the **Celestial Sage**,
In **harmony** with the **Dao/Way’s** and the **True Ones’** essence.

The **Assembly of the Dao/Way** is raised,
The **Law-Drum** is struck **twenty-four times**.

The **High Functionary** ignites the **Incense Furnace**—
To the **Supreme Three Heavens**, the **Primordial Origin of the Three Qi’s**,
The **Most High Laozi**, summoning forth from **my body** the **Three Five Officials**,
The **left and right attendants and messengers**,
The **left and right incense bearers**, the **Dragon Stationery Officials** and **Golden Boys**,
The **Jade Maidens who transmit words and scatter flowers**,
The **Five Emperors’ Direct Symbols**, the **Direct Day Incense Officials**,
Each **thirty-six in number**, now **emerge**.

Those who **exit** are clad in **resplendent robes and adornments**,
Their **headgear and sashes** trailing **pendant ribbons**,
**Opening the gates** to this **locality’s earthly and territorial deities**, the **True Spirits** of the realm.

I, **your humble servant**, now **set the Jiao/Expiation Ritual** in earnest,
And **declare my sincerity**—
All **incense and offerings** are **duly recorded** in the **petition scrolls**.
May the **Most High Ten Directions’ Pure Ones** and the **Primordial Qi of the Dao/Way** descend,
Their **Sacred Treasures and Auspicious Light** flowing into **my body**,
So that my **declared sincerity** may swiftly reach
The **Supreme, Boundless, Great Dao/Way**,
The **Three Pure Ones, Most Holy**,
The **Golden Gate of the August Heaven, Jade Sovereign Emperor of Heaven**.

The **Assembly of the Dao/Way** is raised,
And the **Law-Position** is invoked.

With **all ranks** present, I, **your humble servant**, [name],
Alongside the **gathered officiants and disciples**,
Now **jointly declare our sincerity**—
To the **Voidless, Natural Primordial Origin**,
The **Most High Jade Morning Dao/Way Lord**,
The **Most High Golden Gate Laozi**,
The **Most High Jade Sovereign Emperor of Heaven**,
The **Nine Sovereigns, Most Venerable**,
The **Ten Directions’ Sacred Treasures**,
The **Heavenly Great Emperors**,
The **Thirty-Six Departments of Venerable Scriptures**,
The **Mysterious Middle Law-Masters**,
The **Upper Ministers and Upper Advisors**,
The **Upper Protectors and Upper Tutors**,
The **Three Officials and Five Emperors**,
The **Eleven Great Luminaries**,
The **Ten Gods, Supreme Unity**,
The **Southern Dipper’s Six Ministers**,
The **Northern Dipper’s Seven Elemental Stars**,
The **Twenty-Eight Constellations of the Revolving Sky**,
The **Twelve Palace Gods**,
The **Three Hundred Sixty-Five Degrees of Heavenly Hosts**,
The **Native Star of my Destiny**,
The **Celestial Tribunals**,
The **True Rulers of the Nine Heavens**,
The **Three Mountains and Five Peaks**, the **Lodges of Auspicious Peace**,
The **Abyssal Palaces of the Earthly Deeps**, the **Masters of the Altars and Mountains**,
The **Responsive Spirits of the Three Realms**,
All **True and Sacred Essences**.

I have heard:
The **Jade Heaven’s** distance is vast, yet **hardly ascended** by those in **great calamity**;
The **Golden Gate’s** heights are lofty, yet **merely gazed upon** by those in **humble lodgings**.

The **Most Venerable Sovereign** holds sway above,
The **Primordial Transformation** abides in the **center**.
He **opens the Ten Directions’ unobstructed hearts**,
**Responding to all things** with **action**—
He is the **Father of Great Compassion** across the **Three Realms**,
**Viewing all beings** with **pity**.

From the **Elevated Platform** to the **Lowly Dust**, from the **Unfolding of the Cosmic Scroll** to the **Tossing of the Mustard Seed’s Calamity**,
He **looks back** upon the **myriad myriads**, lamenting the **fleeting life** of the **Jin Dynasty’s insects**;
He **gazes down** upon the **nine dusts**, sighing for the **Han Palace’s ants**.

I, **your humble servant**, reflect upon my **lowly station**,
My **fate severed** from the **Celestial Path**—
Thus, I **rely upon** the **received teachings** and **rituals**,
And **diligently** explore the **subtle depths** of my **sincere supplications**.

Now, I, **your humble disciple**, [name],
**Hold the sacred talisman** and **seal the Dao/Way’s court**,
Hoping that **benevolent Heaven** may **observe below**,
And **perceive my slightest virtue** amidst the **dust of the world**.

I **humbly pray** that the **Nine Pure Ones, Most Holy**,
From the **Palace of the Curved and Secret**,
And the **Ten Extremes’ Primordial Sovereign**,
From the **Celestial Chariot of the Flying Void**,
With **hundreds of millions of Heavenly Servants** trailing behind,
And **thousands of officials** leading forth—
**Hurl flames ten thousand li**, calling forth **Yang** while summoning **Yin**;
**Turn incense in three cycles**, ascending from **sun** to **moon**.

To the **furthest East**, they **roam in scorching waters**,
To the **furthest West**, they **behold the setting of the Pei River’s mists**,
To the **South**, they **construct the Vermilion Peak’s Palace**,
In the **Center**, they **encircle the Yellow Congealing’s Hall**,
To the **North**, they **reach the Night City’s Gate**,
Below, they **exhaust the Chilly Spring’s depths**.

It is said that **Lu** is **called the Teacher of the Dao/Way**,
Following the **Great Primordial** in its **procession**—
And **Xi** is **named the World-Honored Sage**,
From the **extension of the True Ones** and their **secret attendance**.

The **Primordial Sovereign’s** **divine command**—
Who **dares not** **revere it**?
I **bow my heart** in **sincere supplication**,
And **look up** to the **cloud-borne arrival**.

I, **your humble disciple**, [name],
With the **fasting officiants**,
**Cannot express** our **deepest reverence**—
We **kneel and prostrate**, **twice bowing**, to **welcome the Sacred Procession**.

The **Celestial Chariot** arrives and **halts**,
The **Crane-Drawn Palanquin** **descends to the court**,
And **gathers with the Jiao’s assembled spirits**,
As **rituals of morning worship** are **performed**.

After the **morning worship** is **completed**,
We **request permission** to **ascend the Jiao platform**—
The **officiants** **present incense**,
And **offer the first libation**.

The **metal chimes** are struck,
**Flowers are scattered**, and **music is played**.

With **all ranks** present, I, **your humble disciple**, [name],
Alongside the **gathered platform officials**,
Now **renew my sincerity**—
To the **Three Pure Ones, Most Holy**, the **Treasure Realm’s True Spirits**.

Indeed,
The **Primordial Scene** is **universally spread**—
There is **no distinction** between **high and low**;
The **myriad myriads’ forms** are **all nurtured** by the **Pure and Gentle Qi**.

Since **life and death** are **distant realms**,
And **likes and dislikes** are **profoundly manifold**—
The **filthy body** may **indulge in depravity**,
Yet the **Great Dao/Way** **ever descends** to **bestow virtue**.

Some **offenses** are **deep-rooted**,
And **fears** of **karmic retribution** may **lie hidden**.
If one **awakens** to the **hundred faults**,
Then **all calamities** are **dissipated**.

Now, I, **your humble disciple**, [name],
**Recognize** my **spirit’s stagnation** and **soul’s terror**—
From the **great calamity**, I **have fallen into ruin**,
And **lost the Primordial Essence**, **fleeing in agitation**.

I **do not climb** the **Awakening Tree**,
Yet **take delight** in the **flaming peak**;
I **do not enter** the **True Court**,
Yet **am content** to **burn in the House of Fire**.

The **Six Tribunals** **run wild**, the **Three Karmas** **entangle me**—
Only through the **Highest Sage’s** **proclaimed compassion**,
The **Great Shelter** for **sentient beings**, may **salvation** be **opened**.

Now, I, **your humble disciple**, [name],
**Return to the Dao/Way** and **bow my head**,
**Praying** for **Heaven’s vast mercy**—
I **humbly beg** the **Most Holy Upper Spirits**,
The **Highest True Emperors**,
To **bestow grace** and **deliver my suffering**,
To **grant life** and **remove my calamities**.
