**The Complete Daoist Rituals and Regulations, Volume Sixty-Six Complete**
**The Complete Daoist Rituals and Regulations, Volume Sixty-Seven**
*Disciple Zhong Li, studying the Three Caverns Scripture of the Daoist Rituals*
**Ritual of the True Martial Spirit’s Miraculous Response to the Great Expiation**
*Evening Dao/Way Ritual*

The ritual platform is raised as per the prescribed manner.
Each reverently honors the Master, focusing their spirit in accordance with the Dao/Way.

**Recite the Protective Spirit Incantations**:
The Great Yin transforms and gives birth,
The essence of the Water position.
The **Supreme Dao/Way of the Boundless Extremes** responds above,
The Tortoise and Serpent coalesce in form.

Circumnavigate the Six Extremes,
Dominate the myriad spirits with awe.
No hidden thing escapes scrutiny,
No wish remains unfulfilled.

At the end of the kalpa and its beginning,
Sever and subdue the **demonic essences**.
Rescue and protect all beings,
Ensuring peace for the family and the state.

Should any **minor specters** dare to approach and manifest,
With one glance, the Five Sacred Mountains will crumble—
In harmony with the Dao/Way’s True Martial Spirit.

**Beat the Law Drum twenty-four times**.

The **Supreme Three Heavens**—**Heavenly Primordial Sovereign** of the Three **Qi**,
**Supreme Dao Lord**,
**Supreme Old Lord**—
Summon forth from within my body the **Three Five Officials** of my **Triple Five**,
The **Left and Right Officials and Messengers**,
The **Left and Right Bearers of Incense**,
The **Postal Dragon Cavalry Officers**,
The **Golden Boy Attendants of Incense**,
The **Jade Maiden Messengers of Flowers**,
The **Five Emperors’ Direct Talismans**,
The **Direct Day Incense Officials**,
**Thirty-six persons in total**—to emerge.

Those who exit must don **auspicious ceremonial attire**,
Wearing **headdresses and sashes with trailing ribbons**,
Opening the **Mysterious Daoist Altar** to the **Land Spirits** and **Territorial Deities**,
And the **regional spirit officials and Perfected Ones**.

Now, in this quiet evening, as I practice the Dao/Way,
I humbly present this to declare my intent—
All sincerity has been recorded and conveyed.
I pray that the **Supreme Dao’s Ten-Directional Boundless Essences**,
The **Numinous Treasures’ Auspicious Light**,
May descend and flow into my body.
My current supplications,
Swiftly reaching the **Supreme Dao of the Boundless Extremes**,
Before the **August Heavenly Jade Emperor** in the **Celestial Court**.

**Request the invocation of the Dao/Way’s station**.

I, **Disciple** [Name], along with the **Thirty-six Officials of the Platform**,
Humbly present our united sincerity:
The **Supreme Dao of the Boundless Extremes**,
**Primordial Sovereign of the True Martial Spirit**,
**Supreme Dao Lord**,
**Supreme Old Lord**,
**Supreme Heavenly Jade Emperor**,
**Nine Sovereigns Above**,
**Ten-Directional Boundless Dao**,
**Supreme Numinous Treasures Sovereign**,
The **Perfected Ones who have attained the Dao**,
The **Supreme True Martial Spirit**,
The **Thirty-six Departments of Sacred Scriptures and Mysterious Daoist Masters**,
The **True Martial Spirit of the Northern Pole**,
The **Responsive Deities of the Three Realms**,
All **Perfect Spirits**.

I have heard that the **Great Ultimate** first divided,
And the **Two Qi** established the hierarchy of **Emperors and Deities**.
The **Primordial Essence** having been apportioned,
The **Five Agents** promulgated the methods of transformation.
Though the rise and fall are endless,
The **Root Source** remains inherently true.
Dwelling in **Kan**, it returns to the **Root and Command**,
In **Gèn**, it aids the **Beginning and End**.

Thus, **Yang** must arise from the **Yin**,
And the **Emperor** first manifests in the **Zhen** position.
Drawing from the **Heaven’s One Supreme Essence**,
It becomes the **foundation for all beings** under the **Auspicious Sun**.

Therefore, my **True Martial Sovereign**,
Resides in the **Northern Gate**,
Embodying the **virtue/power of creation** from Heaven and Earth,
Wielding the **spirit of harmonizing Yin and Yang**.
How could this be without inherent cause?
It is also achieved through deliberate means.

The **Ritual Officials**, [Name] and others,
Have reverently studied the **Daoist classics**,
Traced the **footprints of the Perfected**,
And in the **Kaihuang** era,
Our land was named **Pure Joy**.
The **Yang Essence** radiates auspiciousness,
Awakening the **extraordinary pregnancy of the Tortoise and Serpent**.
The **White Spirit** bears the **Perfect Roundness**,
Revealing the **exceedingly miraculous birth of the Jade Maiden**.
Descending into the **Purple Hall of Spirits**,
Nurturing the **virtue/power** in the **Green Palace**.

Open and unrestrained,
The **spirit** roams freely in **Heaven’s vast expanse**;
Pure and self-sufficient,
Viewing wealth and nobility as fleeting clouds.

Having completed the **True Martial** practice,
My body ascends to the **Pivot of the Sky**,
Following the **Jade Emperor’s** wondrous teachings,
And pacifying the **remote regions of the Northern Pole**.

The **Child and the Ox** (hours) converge,
Leading all **Palaces** with my singular preeminence;
The **Supreme Dao of the Boundless Extremes** and the **True Martial Spirit** stand as twin supports,
Surrounding and augmenting the **illustrious luminaries**.

Now, as the **Ten Earthly Branches** decline in transformation,
And the **Six Heavens** teem with **demonic forces**,
The **ominous aura** spreads unchecked,
The **killing qi** pervades and corrupts.
It has both **cut short the vitality of living beings**
And **obscured and deceived the Heavenly Observation**.
The cries of the wronged reach the heavens,
The **Heavenly Sovereign’s** compassion responds with pity.
The **miraculous Dao/Way** is invoked and revealed,
The **attendant spirits** hasten to summon.

The **wind** moves, the **thunder** shakes—
The **courageous and mighty** are proclaimed;
The **lightning** sweeps, the **clouds** dissipate—
All **demonic and malevolent** are eradicated.

Thus, all beings are now rescued and protected.
The **Ritual Officials**, [Name] and others,
Have long basked in your **blessings**,
And humbly heard your **sacred teachings**.
We have engaged in **incense rituals** since the seasons began,
And now, as the **stars align in their proper order**,
We dare to offer our **pure and sincere prayers**,
To repay the **virtue/power of the Auspicious Dao** above,
And to express our **sincere remorse and gratitude** below.
We await your **compassionate acceptance**,
And humbly confess our **earthly defilements**.
Trusting in your **high and boundless vision**,
You will surely descend with **merciful regard**.
Gazing upon us through the **clouds and mists**,
No distance will hinder your arrival—
We earnestly implore with **urgent sincerity**,
Daring not to withhold this offering.

**Recite the Invocation**.

As per the **formal invocation**,
All sincerity is fully displayed.

We humbly invoke the **Sovereign’s virtue/power**, majestic and towering,
Pressing down upon the **near attendants of the Purple Micro**;
The **spirit’s prowess** is swift and keen,
Proclaiming the **Jade Emperor’s** mighty **aura**.

Though you bestow **commandments upon the Northern Pole**,
Your **Heavenly Observations** extend across the **Nine Realms**.
Your **essence** is stored in the **Water virtue/power**,
Your **position** is anchored in the **Stellar Stream**.

Your **movements** are unrestrained,
Responding to human hearts like an echo;
Your **clarity and wisdom** never falter,
Punishing **demonic beings** without fail.

This is where my **vows** are fulfilled,
And the **vast region** relies upon your **blessings**.
Now, the **Ritual Officials**, [Name] and others,
Our hearts incline like **loyal plants**,
Our offerings are inscribed in **auspicious writings**—
The **incense** emits **fragrant vapors**,
The **lamps** align with the **stars** in radiance.
The **phoenix wax** releases the **spring’s splendor**,
The **snowflake buds** generate the **wind of rain**.

Ascending to the **clouds and mists**,
We are borne aloft by the **wind-horse**;
Illuminating the **palaces and treasuries**,
We are also conveyed by the **golden coins**.

Reciting the **Secret Edicts** beneath the **Pure Sky**,
Inviting the **True Ones** to gather at the **humble seat**.

With this **quiet night** of **Dao practice**,
We, the **Law Assembly**, now light the **first incense strand**,
Wishing this **fragrant smoke** to ascend the heavens,
To **offer** to the **Three Pure Ones**, the **Supreme Saints**,
The **August Sovereign of the **Boundless Sky**,
And the **True Martial Lord of the Northern Dipper**, the **Responsive True One**.

We, the **subjects**, **surrender body, spirit, and fate**,
And with this **meritorious act of incense-offering**,
We **pray for** the **current Emperor**.

May we humbly wish:
That the **Two Principles** remain steadfast,
The **Three Lights** shine in harmony,
That **benevolence** match **Emperor Yao and Tang**,
And **transformations** surpass **Xī and Hòu**.

May the **consorts and princes**, the **heir and nobles**,
Receive **virtue’s praise** in the **Purple Court**,
And **merit** uphold the **Royal Polarity**.

May the **ministers and officials**, both **inner and outer**,
Spread **abundant grace without favoritism**,
And achieve **harmony and prosperity** to **cultivate the Way**.

May **weapons** forever be **sheathed**,
Floods and droughts **never arise**,
Plagues and poisons **be extinguished**,
And **demonic influences** **withdraw**.

Now, with this **incense-burning**,
We **surrender** to the **Dao’s Supreme Saints**, the **Great Saints**, the **Most True Assembly**.

After attaining the **Dao**,
We **ascend to the Formless**,
And **harmonize** with the **True Dao**.

With this **quiet night** of **Dao practice**,
We, the **Law Assembly**, now light the **second incense strand**,
Wishing this **fragrant smoke** to ascend directly,
To **offer** to the **True Martial Lord of the Northern Dipper**, the **Responsive True One**,
And his **attendant Star Lord of the Martial Chord**,
And all **saints of the Northern Dipper**.

We, the **subjects**, **surrender body, spirit, and fate**,
And with this **meritorious act of incense-offering**,
We **return** to **reverence the Dao** in the **Certain House**,
For **nine generations and seven mystic lineages**,
To **ascend the soul** in the **Dark Night**,
To **refine the spirit** in the **Crimson Palace**,
To **bathe in the flowing fire** and **attain the True**,
To **be inscribed in the Jade Registers** and **verify rank**,
To **hang blessings** and **receive auspicious fortune**,
And to **see living benefits**.

Now, with this **incense-burning**,
We **surrender** to the **Scripture’s Supreme Saints**, the **Great Saints**, the **Most True Assembly**.

After attaining the **Dao**,
We **ascend to the Formless**,
And **harmonize** with the **True Dao**.

With this **quiet night** of **Dao practice**,
We, the **Law Assembly**, now light the **third incense strand**,
Wishing this **fragrant smoke** to ascend the heavens,
To **offer** to the **True Martial Lord of the Northern Dipper**, the **Responsive True One**,
And the **Three Realms’ Responsive Ones**, all **mighty and numinous spirits**.

We, the **subjects**, **surrender body, spirit, and fate**,
And with this **meritorious act of incense-offering**,
We **return** to **reverence the Dao** for **Certain and others**,
To **reward the virtuous** with **auspicious influences**,
And to **receive divine praise and assistance**.

May the **Five Phases and Three Fates**
Never bring **calamitous punishments**;
May **past debts and grievances**
All **align with peace and joy**.

May **lifespans expand**,
And **guilt be cleansed**.

Now, with this **incense-burning**,
We **surrender** to the **Teacher’s Supreme Saints**, the **Great Saints**, the **Most True Assembly**.

After attaining the **Dao**,
We **ascend to the Formless**,
And **harmonize** with the **True Dao**.

We **reaffirm our Lawful Station**.

We, **Certain**, the **officer of this rank**, along with the **congregated officials of the altar**,
Solemnly and sincerely **petition above**:
To the **Supreme Dao of the Boundless Extremes**, the **Primordial Heavenly Sovereign**,
The **Supreme Dao Lord**, the **Supreme Old Lord**,
The **Supreme Jade Emperor of the Boundless Sky**,
The **Nine Sovereigns of High Rank**,
The **Ten Directions of the Boundless**,
The **Supreme Spirit Treasure Heavenly Sovereign**,
The **Already Dao-Attained Great Saints**,
The **Most True Assembly**,
All **Honored Lords and Masters**,
The **Thirty-Six Departments of Sacred Scriptures**, the **Great Lawmasters of the Mystic Middle**,
The **Aid-Spirit True Martial Lord of the Northern Dipper**, the **Responsive True One**,
The **Three Realms’ Responsive Ones**, all **true spirits**.

We have heard:
That the **proud, extravagant, and licentious**
Are **close to evil**;
That the **upright, serene, and reverent**
Are **beloved by the spirits**.

chunks.original_text: 虽至真之莫测，而此理之必然。 恭惟圣道虽洪，正人是与。 傥欲依栖於荫佑，宜先洗涤於积愆。 仰冀大慈，俯昭丹悃。 伏念醮官某等尘寰胶扰，世网萦缠，六贼外攻，三尸内诳。 庚申甲子，功果阙违； 四序三元，熏修脱略。 五辛杂糅，遂昏染於五情； 三熏蒸，乃酝成於三毒。 美衣丰食，不一念从来； 谤语恶声，罔知所戒。 或规图财贿，敛怨世俗之小人； 或杀害生灵，重伤天地之大德。 见取直情之见，心无悔过之心。 细行不矜，正神远离。 百邪得计，万死何堪。 幸停天仗之云軿，敢沥愚衷之血恳。 仰祈肆赦，许与自新。 伏愿醮官某等，内湛灵台，外齐止水，三宫皎洁，六气和平，常安不二之神，默守天元之妙。 丹田固密，炼成养浩之功； 琼液降升，超得谷神之要。 呼吸灌三光之真炁，绵延齐九转之遐年，青篇摽功行之书，黑簿落愆尤之字，常依正法，密借慈光，出入行藏，明一神协契，温清寒燠，疫疠殄除，魑魅魍魉之莫逢，富寿康宁之必致。 上愿天清地静，国泰民安，同归清静之风，共乐升平之化。 上明天尊大慈之泽，下副臣等皈向之诚，谨启以闻。 十二愿。 复炉。 谨摄香官使者、左右龙虎君、侍香诸灵官，当令臣向来静夜行道之所，自然生金液丹碧，芝英百灵，众真交会，在此香火炉前。 当愿十方仙童玉女，接侍兰烟，传臣向来所启之诚，速达径御至真无极大道、昊天玉皇上帝御前。 出堂颂。 出户。
chunks.translated_text:
「Though the **Most True Assembly** may be unfathomable,
This principle is **inevitably so**.

In reverence of the **Holy Dao**, though vast, the **upright** align with it.
If one seeks to dwell beneath the **Dao’s shelter and aid**,
One must first **purify** from accumulated **sins and errors**.

We look up to the **Great Mercy** above,
And below, we manifest the **Sincere Devotion**.

In humility, we confess:
That beings like us, bound by the **dusty world’s entanglements**,
Ensnared by the **worldly net**,
Assailed by the **Six External Demons**,
And deceived by the **Three Internal Emptinesses**,
Have, in the years **Gengshen-Jiazzi** (庚申甲子),
Failed to fulfill our **meritorious deeds**;
In the four seasons and three **cosmic phases** (四序三元),
Our **incense cultivation** (熏修) has been neglected and abandoned.

The **Five Senses** (五情) have been **polluted** by the **Five Sins** (五辛),
And the **Three Poisons** (三毒) have been **brewed** by the **Three Emptinesses** (三).
We indulge in **luxurious garments and abundant food**,
Yet never reflect on their **origins**;
We **slander and speak ill**,
And **heed no warnings** of virtue.

Some **scheme** for wealth and bribes,
Accumulating **grudges** from **worldly petty folk**;
Others **slay and harm living beings**,
Severely **injuring** the **great virtue** of **Heaven and Earth**.

We hold **direct and unfiltered views**,
Yet our **hearts lack remorse** for past wrongs.

Our **petty actions** go unacknowledged,
While **true spirits** remain distant.

**A hundred evils** find opportunity,
And **ten thousand deaths**—how could we endure?

We dare to **petition** beneath the **Celestial Procession’s clouded palanquin** (天仗之云軿),
And **pour forth** our **sincere, humble prayers** (愚衷之血恳).

We **pray for universal forgiveness** (肆赦),
And **seek permission to renew ourselves**.

May we, the **incense officials** (醮官),
**Internally purify** the **Spirit Platform** (灵台),
**Externally align** with the **stillness of water** (止水),
That the **Three Palaces** (三宫) may shine with clarity,
And the **Six Qi** (六气) be in harmony,
Ever maintaining the **unshaken spirit** (不二之神),
And **silently guarding** the **Heavenly Primordial Mystery** (天元之妙).

May the **Elixir Field** (丹田) be **secure and sealed**,
And our **refining work** yield the **vast nourishment** (养浩之功);
May the **Jade Nectar** (琼液) descend and ascend,
So we may **ascend** and grasp the **Essence of the Valley Spirit** (谷神之要).

By **breathing** to **irrigate** the **Three Lights’ true Qi** (三光之真炁),
We may **prolong** our **Nine Transformations’ distant lifespan** (九转之遐年).
May the **Blue Scriptures** (青篇) record our **meritorious deeds**,
And the **Black Registers** (黑簿) note our **transgressions and sins** (愆尤之字).

We shall **constantly depend** on the **True Law** (正法),
And **borrow secretly** the **Merciful Light** (慈光).
In our **comings and goings**, may the **One Spirit** (明一神) **harmonize** with our **sincerity**.
May we **adjust** to the **cool and warm**,
And **banish** all **epidemics and calamities** (疫疠).
May we **never encounter** **demonic creatures** (魑魅魍魉),
And **inevitably attain** **wealth, longevity, health, and peace** (富寿康宁).

We **pray** that **Heaven may be clear and Earth still**,
That the **land flourish** and its **people be at ease**,
All **returning** to the **pure and tranquil wind** (清静之风),
And **sharing** in the **joy of the Auspicious Transformation** (升平之化).

We **declare** the **Heavenly Sovereign’s great mercy** (天尊大慈之泽),
And **fulfill** our **sincere devotion** (臣等皈向之诚).
Thus, we **respectfully submit** our prayers.

**Twelve Vows** (十二愿).
**Re-entering the Furnace** (复炉).

We **respectfully summon** the **incense officers and messengers** (香官使者),
The **Left and Right Dragon-Tiger Lords** (左右龙虎君),
And the **attendant spirits** (侍香诸灵官),
So that they may **command** the place where we **now turn toward the Dao** (臣向来静夜行道之所),
Where **golden nectar and elixir jade** (金液丹碧),
**Herbs of longevity and myriad spirits** (芝英百灵) naturally arise,
And the **true spirits** (众真) **gather** here at this **incense furnace**.

May we **vow** that the **Ten Directions’ celestial youths and jade maidens** (十方仙童玉女),
**Receive and attend** to the **fragrant clouds** (兰烟),
And **transmit** our **sincere petitions** (所启之诚),
Swiftly reaching the **Primordial Dao’s Most True and Boundless Sovereign** (至真无极大道),
And the **Heavenly Sovereign’s Divine Presence** (昊天玉皇上帝御前).

**Eulogy upon Leaving the Hall** (出堂颂).
**Departing the Doorway** (出户).

chunks.original_text: 道门科范大全集卷之六十七竟 道门科范大全集卷之六十八 广成先生杜光庭删定 真武灵应大醮仪 设醮行道 法事升坛如式。 各礼师存念如法。 宣卫灵咒。 五星列照，焕明五方。 水星却灾，木德致昌。 荧惑削祸，太白辟兵。 镇星四据，家国利亨。 名刊玉简，字录帝房。 乘飙散景，飞腾太空。 出入冥无，游宴十方。 五云浮盖，招神摄风。 役使万灵，上卫仙翕，和与道合真。 鸣法鼓二十四通。 无上三天玄元始三炁，太上道君，太上老君，召出臣身中三五功曹，左右官使者，左右捧香，驿龙骑吏，侍香金童，传言散花玉女，五帝直符，直日香官，合三十六人出。 出者严装显服，冠带垂缨，关启玄坛土地，方域神真。 臣今静夜行道，谨奏为入意，其诸忱悃，已录告闻，愿得太上十方至真道炁，灵宝瑞光下降，流入臣身中，令臣所启，速达径御太上无极大道、昊天玉皇上帝御前。 请称法位。 具位臣某与合坛众等，谨同诚上启，太上无极大道，元始天尊，太上大道君，太上老君，太上昊天玉皇上帝，九皇上尊，十方无极，太上灵宝天尊，已得道大圣，众至真，诸君丈人，三十六部尊经玄中大法师，北极佑圣真武灵应真君，三界应感，一切真灵。 臣闻龙汉纪号之初，元始演法之日，敷五云之妙座，会十方之众真。 上元仙宫，天乐自响，俄於艮位，大震七声，奄辟天门，下观世界。 黑毒血光之炁，自下而冲； 太阳道境之中，俯目皆见。 爰有妙行，发问异因，欲请威光，下除魔鬼，感天尊之慈训，述真武之灵踪。 净乐国王，善胜皇后，吞日光於梦寐，诞圣子於宫闱，禀自然之神灵，负过人之勇猛，辅行正教，难遏勤诚，誓断天下之妖魔，普救世间之群品。 武当修道，功成於四十二年； 白日登天，德正於北方水位。 乃辍金童之侍，俾持招真之符。 遥往朔都，召其神将。 仙仪萃止，欻驾来斯。 奉眷命於真皇，期肃清於下境。 披发而乌云拂踵，跣足而白玉莹空。 蹑八卦之神龟，螣蛇亦附； 仗七星之宝剑，神水相随。 雷电扬威，风云捧步。 六丁玉女，六甲直符，毒龙猛兽之纷纭，巨虬狮子之围绕，统吏兵之三十余万，判人鬼於七日之中，弥天之妖炁荡除，作孽之冤魂解散，生人安泰，国土清平，复朝见於天尊，永临镇於北极。 今醮官某阅殊勋於宝恢，难尽偷扬； 奉真驭於灵辰，欲资佑助。
chunks.translated_text:
「The *Complete Science and Doctrine of the Dao Gate* concludes in Volume Sixty-Seven,
Volume Sixty-Eight begins: *The Master Guangting Du of Broad Achievement’s* revised compilation.

**Ritual for the Grand Conjuration of the Divine Martial Spirit’s Efficacy** (真武灵应大醮仪)
**Establishing the Conjuration and Practicing the Dao** (设醮行道)

The **ceremonial rites ascend the platform** as prescribed (法事升坛如式).
Each **respectfully honors the Dao Master** in accordance with the law (各礼师存念如法).
**Declaring the Sacred Incantations to Guard the Realm** (宣卫灵咒).

The **Five Stars** align and illuminate, brightening the **Five Directions** (五星列照，焕明五方).
The **Water Star** repels calamities (水星却灾),
The **Wood Star** brings prosperity (木德致昌).
The **Uranus Star** (荧惑) cuts off misfortune,
The **Jupiter Star** (太白) wards off soldiers.
The **Saturn Star** (镇星) firmly holds its ground,
Benefiting the **family and state** (家国利亨).

The **names are inscribed on jade tablets** (名刊玉简),
The **characters recorded in the Celestial Palace** (字录帝房).
They **ride the tempestuous winds** and scatter their brilliance (乘飙散景),
Soaring through the **vast expanse** (飞腾太空),
Entering and exiting the **mysterious void** (出入冥无),
**Roaming and feasting** across the **Ten Directions** (游宴十方).

The **Five Clouds** float as a canopy (五云浮盖),
Summoning the **divine spirits** and restraining the **winds** (招神摄风).
They **command the myriad spirits** (役使万灵),
Ascending to **guard the Dao** (上卫仙翕),
In harmony with the **Dao’s True Essence** (和与道合真).

**Striking the Sacred Drum** twenty-four times (鸣法鼓二十四通).

The **Supreme Three Heavens’ Primordial Dao Essence** (无上三天玄元始三炁),
The **Most High Dao Sovereign** (太上道君),
The **Most High Lao Sovereign** (太上老君),
**Summon forth** from within my body the **Three Five Officials** (三五功曹),
The **Left and Right Official Attendants** (左右官使者),
The **Left and Right Incense Bearers** (左右捧香),
The **Postal Dragon and Mounted Officials** (驿龙骑吏),
The **Golden Boys Attending Incense** (侍香金童),
The **Jade Maidens Scattering Flowers and Conveying Messages** (传言散花玉女),
The **Five Emperors’ Direct Talismans** (五帝直符),
The **Direct Talismans of the Day Star** (直日香官),
And the **Thirty-Six** (合三十六人) **assembled**.

Those who **emerge** are clad in **solemn attire and resplendent garments** (严装显服),
Their **headdresses and sashes** adorned with trailing ribbons (冠带垂缨),
Opening the **gateways of the Mysterious Dao’s Earthly Deities** (关启玄坛土地),
And the **spirits of the realm and domain** (方域神真).

I now **practice the Dao in solemn night** (静夜行道),
**Respectfully present this as my sincere intention** (谨奏为入意).
All my **devoted sincerity** (诸忱悃) has been **recorded and reported** (已录告闻).
I pray that the **Most High Dao’s Essence of the Ten Directions** (太上十方至真道炁),
The **Sacred Treasure’s Auspicious Light** (灵宝瑞光),
May **descend and flow** into my body (下降，流入臣身中),
So that my **petitions** may **swiftly reach** the **Most High Boundless Dao** (令臣所启，速达径御太上无极大道),
And the **Divine Presence of the Most High Heavenly Sovereign** (昊天玉皇上帝御前).

**Requesting the invocation of the Dao’s rank** (请称法位).
**I, [Name], of the Conjuration Officials** (醮官某), along with the **assembled spirits of the platform** (合坛众等),
**Solemnly present my sincere vows** (谨同诚上启):

To the **Most High Boundless Dao** (太上无极大道),
The **Primordial Sovereign of Heaven** (元始天尊),
The **Most High Dao Sovereign** (太上大道君),
The **Most High Lao Sovereign** (太上老君),
The **Most High Heavenly Sovereign of the Jade Palace** (太上昊天玉皇上帝),
The **Nine Sovereigns Above** (九皇上尊),
The **Ten Directions’ Boundless Dao** (十方无极),
The **Most High Celestial Sovereign of the Sacred Treasure** (太上灵宝天尊),
The **Already Dao-Attained Great Saints** (已得道大圣),
The **Multitude of True Essences** (众至真),
The **Honorable Lords** (诸君丈人),
The **Thirty-Six Departments of Supreme Scriptures** (三十六部尊经玄中大法师),
The **True Martial Spirit of the Northern Pole’s Auspicious Response** (北极佑圣真武灵应真君),
The **Responsive Spirits of the Three Realms** (三界应感),
And the **All-Encompassing True Spirits** (一切真灵).

I have heard that at the **beginning of the Han Dynasty’s celestial era** (龙汉纪号之初),
On the **day when the Primordial Dao was manifested** (元始演法之日),
The **Five Clouds** spread beneath the **wondrous seat** (敷五云之妙座),
And the **multitude of True Spirits from the Ten Directions** gathered (会十方之众真).
At the **Upper Primordial Dao’s Celestial Palace** (上元仙宫),
The **heavenly music resounded** on its own (天乐自响),
When suddenly at the **Gan Position** (艮位),
A **great tremor of seven sounds** shook the heavens (大震七声),
And the **Celestial Gate was swiftly opened** (奄辟天门),
To **descend and observe the world** (下观世界).

The **Essence of Dark Poison and Blood Light** surged upward from below (黑毒血光之炁，自下而冲);
Within the **Dao’s realm of the Great Sun** (太阳道境之中),
**All was visible** when gazing downward (俯目皆见).

Then arose the **wondrous deeds** (妙行),
The **strange causes** for inquiry (发问异因),
To **request the Sovereign’s might and splendor** (欲请威光),
To **descend and eliminate demons and spirits** (下除魔鬼),
**Acknowledging the Heavenly Sovereign’s compassionate teachings** (感天尊之慈训),
And **recounting the True Martial Spirit’s sacred traces** (述真武之灵踪).

The **King of Pure Joy** (净乐国王) and the **Queen of Good Victory** (善胜皇后),
**Swallowed the Sun’s Light in their dreams** (吞日光於梦寐),
And **gave birth to the Holy Child in the palace halls** (诞圣子於宫闱).
They **inherited the natural divine spirits** (禀自然之神灵),
And **bore the courage of humanity** (负过人之勇猛),
**Assisting the propagation of the orthodox teaching** (辅行正教),
**Undaunted by obstacles**, their **sincerity was unyielding** (难遏勤诚),
**Vowing to exterminate the world’s demonic spirits** (誓断天下之妖魔),
And to **universally save all beings** (普救世间之群品).

At **Mount Wudang**, their **Dao cultivation was perfected** in **forty-two years** (武当修道，功成於四十二年);
On **the White Day**, they **ascended to Heaven** (白日登天),
Their **virtue and power** aligned with the **Northern Pole’s Water Position** (德正於北方水位).
Thus they **laid aside the attendance of the Golden Boys** (辍金童之侍),
And **held the talismans to summon the True Spirits** (俾持招真之符).
They **journeyed to the distant Northern Capital** (遥往朔都),
**Summoning their divine generals** (召其神将).
The **celestial rites ceased**, and **swiftly they arrived here** (仙仪萃止，欻驾来斯).
They **received the mandate from the True Sovereign** (奉眷命於真皇),
**Determined to clear the lower realms of impurities** (期肃清於下境).
Their **hair blackened by dark clouds**, their **feet bare upon the empty void** (披发而乌云拂踵，跣足而白玉莹空).
They **rode upon the Eight Trigrams’ divine tortoise** (蹑八卦之神龟),
And the **mythical serpent followed** (螣蛇亦附);
They **wielded the Seven Stars’宝剑** (仗七星之宝剑),
And the **sacred waters accompanied them** (神水相随).
**Thunder and lightning displayed their might** (雷电扬威),
**Winds and clouds bore them aloft** (风云捧步).

The **Thirty-Six Heavenly Soldiers** (六丁玉女) and the **Thirty-Six Earthly Soldiers** (六甲直符),
**Dispatched the swarming poisonous dragons and ferocious beasts** (毒龙猛兽之纷纭),
**Scattered the encircling giant tortoises and lions** (巨虬狮子之围绕),
And **commanded over thirty million divine troops** (统吏兵之三十余万).
They **judged between humans and spirits** within **seven days** (判人鬼於七日之中),
And the **demonic essences of the heavens were dispersed** (弥天之妖炁荡除),
The **suffering souls of transgressors were liberated** (作孽之冤魂解散),
So that **living beings were at peace** (生人安泰),
And the **land was free from calamities** (国土清平).
They **returned to pay homage before the Heavenly Sovereign** (复朝见於天尊),
And **forever dwelled in the Northern Pole’s domain** (永临镇於北极).

Now, **I, the Conjuration Official**, having **reviewed the extraordinary merits** (阅殊勋於宝恢),
**Cannot fully express my gratitude** (难尽偷扬);
I **received the True Martial Spirit’s command** at the **auspicious hour** (奉真驭於灵辰),
And **desire to seek their assistance** (欲资佑助).

And the **true spirits** (众真) **gather** here at this **incense furnace**.

May we **vow** that the **Ten Directions’ celestial youths and jade maidens** (十方仙童玉女),
**Receive and attend** to the **fragrant clouds** (兰烟),
And **transmit** our **sincere petitions** (所启之诚),
Swiftly reaching the **Primordial Dao’s Most True and Boundless Sovereign** (至真无极大道),
And the **Heavenly Sovereign’s Divine Presence** (昊天玉皇上帝御前).

chunks.original_text: 爰择储祥之地，用伸延圣之仪。 陈醪醴以惟馨，荐粢盛而有洁。 列以九微之烛，散以百和之香。 悉罄精衷，上祈冲鉴。 庶被无疆之福祉，永依有赫之威灵。 臣与醮官合坛众等，无任伫望仰请之至，诚惶诚恐，稽首再拜，奉迎真驭。 降真，献茶。 初献，散花。 具位臣某，谨虔诚上启，虚无自然金阙至尊，十方无极，太上灵宝天尊，已得道大圣，众至真，诸君丈人，三十六部尊经玄中大法师，北极佑圣真武灵应真君，三界应感，一切真灵。 臣闻英灵混合，结万炁以齐仙； 浇伪兹生，有群阴之变异。 大则日月薄蚀，小则魑魅猖狂。 自动化失，谬於中和； 使品汇遂，乖於至理。 洪惟大道，寔念黔黎。 命灵天正肃之神，扫下土妄行之炁，一挥皂纛，咸殄渠魁。 奉道醮官某等，久奉真光，每叨灵荫，幸仙仗降临於是日，望霄衢祇迓於皇威，少输蝼蚁之诚，以接龙鸾之驭。 幸蒙降鉴，益谨钦承，据情捆之再三，对灵光於咫尺。 臣既承词悃，敢不上闻。 宣词。 按如词言，诚深皈奉。 矧兹下土，寔仰余威。 验若形声，应同影响。 言念某蟪蛄末品，草芥微生，惟勤香火之修，莫究希夷之妙，动违科禁，恐获谴尤，抚己兢惶，扪心怵惕，敬涓谷旦，肃建灵场。 仰圣度之含容，祈天休之普洽。 涤瑕荡垢，即蒙一洗之恩； 度厄延生均荷维新之泽。 臣等无任激切祈请之至，再拜，谨陈亚献。 散花。 臣谨重诚上启，虚无自然金阙至尊，十方无极，太上灵宝天尊，已得道大圣，众至真，诸君丈人，三十六部尊经玄中大法师，北极佑圣真武灵应真君，三界应感，一切真灵。 臣闻捧金阙之明威，化身示世； 为玉京之元辅，助正却邪。 断灭不祥，巡行有截。 某久钦圣德，恭启醮筵，少伸崇报之私，愿被照临之赐。 深虑尘机荏苒，积不赦之深愆； 业火焚烧，造无边之巨衅。 非投上圣，曷保微生。 伏愿与道圆融，荷天眷佑。 云行雨施，尽原已往之非； 地辟天开，广示自新之路。 庶蒙阴相； 得遂进修。 臣等无任激切恳请之至，再拜，谨陈终献。 散花，宣疏。 臣谨重诚上启，虚无自然金阙至尊，十方无极，太上灵宝天尊，已得道大圣，众至真，诸君丈人，三十六部尊经玄中大法师，北极佑圣真武灵应真君，三界应感，一切真灵。 臣闻上帝九门，惟精诚而可格； 洪范五福，系明德之能徼。 辄以熏场，仰延霞旆，仙科粗息，凡悃毕陈。 上简帝心，彻大罗之渺渺； 仰陈天听，棱正色之苍苍。 愿迁无妄之灾，变作大来之福。 酌醴已伸於潦荐，丹心惟效於葵倾。 仰望洪慈，俯歆素志。 今则丹舆绿辈，排天路以回轩； 珊盖琼轮，望云衢而返驾。 臣等仰瞻飙驭，已在云霄，徒切倾心，奉送圣驾。 臣等下情，无任激切攀恋之至，谨启以闻。 十二愿。 复炉。
chunks.translated_text:
Now, **selecting a site of auspicious reserve** (爰择储祥之地),
To **extend the sacred rites** (用伸延圣之仪).

**Laying out** the **sacred wine and rice wine** (陳醪醴以惟馨),
**Offering** the **pure grains and pure vessels** (荐粢盛而有洁).
**Arranging** the **Nine Veil’s candles** (列以九微之烛),
**Scattering** the **hundred-blended incense** (散以百和之香).
**Devoutly exhausting** the **sincere heart** (悉罄精衷),
**Supplicating** the **Heavenly Sovereign’s discernment** (上祈冲鉴).

May we **receive boundless blessings** (庶被无疆之福祉),
And **forever rely upon the august and mighty** (永依有赫之威灵).

**I, the Conjuration Official**, together with the **assembled ritualists and officials** (臣与醮官合坛众等),
**Humbly await**, **with utmost reverence and longing**, to **petition above** (无任伫望仰请之至),
**With profound awe and fear**, **prostrate twice** (诚惶诚恐，稽首再拜),
**To solemnly welcome the True Martial Spirit** (奉迎真驭).

**Descend, True Martial Spirit!** (降真)
**Offer tea.** (献茶)
**First offering—scatter flowers.** (初献，散花)

**I, the humble servant** (具位臣某),
**With utmost sincerity**, **now humbly petition**:
To the **Emperor of the Golden Peak of the Void-Nothingness** (虚无自然金阙至尊),
The **Ten-Direction Limitless** (十方无极),
The **Supreme Lord of the Numinous Treasure Dao** (太上灵宝天尊),
The **Great Sage Who Has Obtained the Dao** (已得道大圣),
The **Many True Ones** (众至真),
The **Honorable Masters and Lords** (诸君丈人),
The **Thirty-Six Departments’ Venerable Masters of the Mystic Middle Scripture** (三十六部尊经玄中大法师),
The **North Pole’s Auspicious and Holy True Martial Spirit Who Responds to Prayers** (北极佑圣真武灵应真君),
The **Three-Realm Responsive and All-Encompassing True Spirits** (三界应感，一切真灵).

**I have heard** that **heroic spirits** (英灵)
**Merge with the myriad** (混合),
**Forming the ten thousand qi** (结万炁)
To **harmonize with the Immortals** (以齐仙);
**Dispelling falsehood**, **life emerges** (浇伪兹生),
Yet **grouped darkness** brings **strange transformations** (有群阴之变异).
**Greatly**, the **sun and moon are eclipsed** (大则日月薄蚀),
**Lesser**, the **ogres and demons rage** (小则魑魅猖狂).
When **spontaneous transformation falters** (自动化失),
**It strays from the Central Harmony** (谬於中和);
**Thus**, the **ranks and gatherings** become **errant** (使品汇遂),
**Contradicting the Ultimate Principle** (乖於至理).

**Greatly**, the **Dao** (洪惟大道),
**Truly** **pities the black-haired masses** (寔念黔黎).
**Commanding** the **Heavenly Rectifying Spirit** (命灵天正肃之神),
**To sweep away** the **errant qi of the lower earth** (扫下土妄行之炁),
**With one stroke of the black banner** (一挥皂纛),
**All the ringleaders are exterminated** (咸殄渠魁).

**We, the Dao-conjuring officials** (奉道醮官某等),
**Long devoted to the True Light** (久奉真光),
**Ever indebted to its sacred protection** (每叨灵荫),
**Now fortunate** that the **Celestial Vanguard descends upon this day** (幸仙仗降临於是日),
**Gazing toward the celestial thoroughfare** to **reverently await the Imperial Might** (望霄衢祇迓於皇威),
**Offering the sincerest devotion of an ant** (少输蝼蚁之诚),
**To welcome the Dragon and Phoenix’s Vanguard** (以接龙鸾之驭).

**Fortunate to receive Heaven’s favor** (幸蒙降鉴),
**With utmost reverence**, **we humbly accept** (益谨钦承),
**Repeatedly submitting our earnest pleas** (据情捆之再三),
**Facing the sacred light at close proximity** (对灵光於咫尺).

**Having received Your gracious words** (臣既承词悃),
**How dare I not report above?** (敢不上闻).
**Proclaim the words.**
**As the words declare**, **our devotion is profound** (按如词言，诚深皈奉).
**Indeed**, **this lower earth** (矧兹下土),
**Truly relies upon Your mighty influence** (寔仰余威).
**Verified by form and sound**, **it resonates like echo and response** (验若形声，应同影响).

**Reflecting upon my insignificance** (言念某蟪蛄末品),
**A mere blade of grass and insignificant life** (草芥微生),
**Only diligently tending to incense and fire** (惟勤香火之修),
**Yet failing to fathom the Mysterious and Lofty** (莫究希夷之妙),
**Each action violates the sacred prohibitions** (动违科禁),
**Fearful of incurring blame** (恐获谴尤),
**Trembling in self-examination** (抚己兢惶),
**With heart pounding in dread** (扪心怵惕),
**Respectfully offering this morning’s tribute** (敬涓谷旦),
**Solemnly establishing the sacred precinct** (肃建灵场).

**Humbly relying upon the Sacred Decree’s embrace** (仰圣度之含容),
**Praying for Heaven’s auspicious grace to be universally bestowed** (祈天休之普洽).
**May our flaws be cleansed and impurities dispersed** (涤瑕荡垢),
**Immediately receiving the blessing of a thorough purification** (即蒙一洗之恩);
**May we transcend calamity and extend life**, **equally sharing in the renewing grace** (度厄延生均荷维新之泽).

**We, the servants**, **are overwhelmed with urgent and heartfelt petitions** (臣等无任激切祈请之至),
**Prostrate twice**, **now humbly present the secondary offering.** (再拜，谨陈亚献)
**Scatter flowers.** (散花)

**I, the servant**, **with renewed sincerity**, **now humbly petition**:
To the **Emperor of the Golden Peak of the Void-Nothingness** (虚无自然金阙至尊),
The **Ten-Direction Limitless** (十方无极),
The **Supreme Lord of the Numinous Treasure Dao** (太上灵宝天尊),
The **Great Sage Who Has Obtained the Dao** (已得道大圣),
The **Many True Ones** (众至真),
The **Honorable Masters and Lords** (诸君丈人),
The **Thirty-Six Departments’ Venerable Masters of the Mystic Middle Scripture** (三十六部尊经玄中大法师),
The **North Pole’s Auspicious and Holy True Martial Spirit Who Responds to Prayers** (北极佑圣真武灵应真君),
The **Three-Realm Responsive and All-Encompassing True Spirits** (三界应感，一切真灵).

**I have heard** that **the Emperor of Heaven’s Nine Gates** (上帝九门),
**Can only be moved by sincerity** (惟精诚而可格);
**The Five Auspicious Blessings of the Great Plan** (洪范五福),
**Depend upon virtuous deeds to attain** (系明德之能徼).

**Now**, **perfuming the ritual ground** (辄以熏场),
**Gazing upward to the celestial banners** (仰延霞旆),
**The sacred rites are roughly complete** (仙科粗息),
**And all sincere pleas are laid bare** (凡悃毕陈).
**May You inspect the Imperial Heart** (上简帝心),
**Piercing the vastness of the Great Luo** (彻大罗之渺渺);
**May we lay our petitions before Heaven’s ear** (仰陈天听),
**Gazing upon the boundless celestial color** (棱正色之苍苍).

**May we transform groundless calamity into great fortune** (愿迁无妄之灾，变作大来之福).
**The libation of wine is now offered** (酌醴已伸於潦荐),
**And my sincere heart is devoted like the sunflower’s tilt** (丹心惟效於葵倾).

**Humbly awaiting Your boundless compassion** (仰望洪慈),
**Reverently receiving Your gracious intentions** (俯歆素志).

Now, **the red carriage and green attendants** (今则丹舆绿辈),
**Parting the celestial path to return in splendor** (排天路以回轩);
**The coral canopy and jade wheels** (珊盖琼轮),
**Gazing upon the cloudy thoroughfare as the procession departs** (望云衢而返驾).

**We, the servants**, **behold Your swift departure into the clouds** (臣等仰瞻飙驭，已在云霄),
**Yet our hearts ache with longing** (徒切倾心),
**Humbly sending You on Your sacred journey** (奉送圣驾).

**Our deepest sentiments** (臣等下情),
**Are overwhelmed with urgent yearning** (无任激切攀恋之至),
**Now humbly reporting this** (谨启以闻).
**The Twelve Petitions.** (十二愿)
**Reignite the incense burner.** (复炉)

chunks.original_text: 谨摄香官使者、左右龙虎君、侍香诸灵官，当令臣向来静夜行道之所，自然生金液丹碧，芝英百灵，众真交会，在此香火炉前。 当愿十方仙童玉女，接侍兰烟，传臣向来所启之诚，速达径御至真无极大道、昊天玉皇上帝御前。 出堂颂。 出户。 道门科范大全集卷之六十八竟 道门科范大全集卷之六十九 道士修真谢罪仪 启坛行道 法事升坛如式。 各礼师存念如法。 宣卫灵咒。 九炁青天，明星大神。 焕照东乡，洞映九门。 转烛阳光，扫秽除氛。 开明童子，号曰玄卿。 备卫我轩，上对帝君。 收魔束妖，讨捕凶群。 奉承正道，赤书玉文。 九天符命，摄龙驿传。 普天安镇，我得飞仙，与道合真。 三炁丹天，焕景流光。 荧星转烛，洞照太阳。 上有赤精，合契虚皇。 开明灵童，号曰华房。 总统火兵，备守玉堂。 斩邪束妖，剪截魔王。 北帝所承，风火莫当。 流铃交焕，翊卫坛场。 正道流行，敢有巴狂。 我享上功，坐运魁罡。 亿劫长存，保天无疆。 与道合真。 七炁素天，太白流精。 光耀金门，洞照太冥。 中有素皇，号曰帝灵。 保神安镇，卫我身形。 断绝邪源，王道正明。 宫殿整肃，三景齐并。 道合自然，飞升紫庭。 灵宝符命，普惠万生。 元皇正炁，来合我身。 功加一切，天地咸宁，与道合真。 五炁玄天，元始徘徊。 辰星焕烛，光耀太微。 黑灵尊神，号曰层威。 统冠飞天，仙裙羽衣。 备卫五门，检精捕非。 敢有干试，豁落斩摧。 玉符所告，神镇八威。 邪门闭塞，正道明开。 映照我身，三光同辉。 策空驾浮，举形仙飞，与道合真。 一炁黄天，调理乾坤。 陶镕阴阳，总统玄真。 镇星吐辉，流焕九天。 开明童子，号曰天璘。 元炁阳精，焰上朱烟。 洞照天下，及臣等身。 百邪摧落，杀鬼万千。 中山神咒，普天使然。 五灵安镇，身飞上仙，与道合真。 呜法鼓二十四通。 无上三天玄元始三炁，太上道君，太上老．君，召出臣身中三五功曹，左右官使者，左右捧香，驿龙骑吏，侍香金童，传言散花玉女，五帝真符，直日香官，合三十六人出。 出者严装显服，冠带垂缨，关启玄坛土地，方域神真。 臣今静夜行道，谨奏为入意，其诸情悃，已录奏闻，愿得十方至真道炁，灵宝瑞光下降，流入臣身中，令臣所启，速达径御太上无极大道、昊天玉皇上帝御前。 请称法位。 具位臣某与阖坛众官等，今故烧香，以是功德，归流天子王侯，百辟僚属，经籍度师，山林岩栖，修真之士，同学之人，九亲姻族，天下人民，飞行动植，一切众生。 今故烧香，归身、归神、归命太上灵宝自然至真无极大道。 乞赐原赦臣法众等，及修斋道士某，洎师资法属，前世今生，往愆重过，得兔离三恶轮回之道，十苦八难九厄之中，身得道真，飞行虚空，白日升天，侍卫道君，逍遥无上金阙七宝自然宫阙，永与道合，所启通感上御至真无极道前。 忏悔，宣真文。 具位臣某与合坛众官等，同诚上启三清上圣，十极高真，十方灵宝天尊，消愆灭罪天尊，大慈延寿天尊，长生保命天尊，九霄自然生神上帝，度人太皇，三十二天上帝，诸天天尊，诸天上帝，上清日月星斗河汉群真，三官四圣，五师三省真君，九天天曹，诸位真君，历代传宗启教诸大师真，雷霆神虎天医诸司官将，太上诸阶经箓中仙官将吏，地府酆都大帝，幽阴圣众，水府扶桑丹林大帝，阆苑真仙，人元五岳五天圣帝，酆都地祇，合干元帅、太岁土火、温司圣众、州县城隍之神，当境庙貌神祇，观庭土地真官，法坛所隶诸司官将，三界提魂摄魄使者，四界直符功曹使者，醮筵主宰，一切威灵。

**With solemn reverence, the Incense Officials and Messengers, the Left and Right Dragon-Tiger Lords, and the Attendant Spirit Officials of the Incense are now summoned.**

Let them now direct the places where I have previously practiced in quiet nights—where golden elixir and emerald-green essences naturally arise, where mushrooms and hundred-spirited herbs flourish, and where assembled immortals gather before this incense burner.

**I now pray that the celestial children and jade maidens of the Ten Directions may attend to the fragrant mists, swiftly conveying my sincere words to the Supreme and Most High Dao of the Unoriginated and Boundless Great Way, before the august **Hao Tian Yu Huang Di, the Jade Emperor of Heaven.**

**Exit the Hall and Recite the Praise.**
**Exit the Gate.**

---
**The Complete Daoist Ritual Regulations, Volume 68, concludes.**
**The Complete Daoist Ritual Regulations, Volume 69 begins: The Daoist Ritual for Repentance and Seeking Forgiveness.**

**Ritual of Opening the Altar and Conducting the Way.**
**Perform the Ritual Affairs as prescribed.**
**Each pays homage to the Master in accordance with the law.**
**Proclaim the Spirit-Guarding Incantation.**

**Nine Qi of Azure Heaven, the Bright Star Great God.**
Shining upon the eastern quarter, illuminating the Nine Gates.
Turning the torch of Yang light, sweeping away filth and dispersing miasmas.
Awakening the Bright Child, named **Xuan Qing.**
Guarding my hall, facing the Celestial Lord above.
Subduing demons and binding fiends, hunting and capturing the wicked.
Upholding the True Dao, with crimson script and jade inscriptions.
The Nine-Heaven Talismans, conveyed by the Dragon Post.
All under Heaven pacified, I attain flight as an immortal, merging with the Dao.

**Three Qi of Vermilion Heaven, radiant with flowing light.**
The Upholding Stars turn the torch, brightly illuminating the Great Sun.
Above is the **Chi Xing** (Red Pure One), in harmony with the Void Sovereign.
Awakening the Spirit Child, named **Hua Fang.**
Commanding the Fire Soldiers, guarding the Jade Hall.
Severing evil and binding fiends, beheading the demon kings.
What the Northern Emperor upholds, wind and fire cannot withstand.
The flowing bells resplendently gleam, assisting and guarding the altar.
The True Dao spreads abroad—let none dare to rage.
I enjoy the highest merit, seated in the command of the **Kui Gang** (Polarity).
For countless eons, I endure eternally, preserving Heaven without bounds.
Merging with the Dao.

**Seven Qi of White Heaven, the Great White flows with essence.**
Illuminating the Golden Gate, piercingly revealing the Great Darkness.
Within is the **Su Huang** (White Sovereign), named **Di Ling.**
Preserving the spirit and ensuring stability, guarding my form.
Cutting off all evil sources, the Royal Dao shines forth.
Palaces and halls are orderly, the Three Lights aligned.
Merging with the Dao naturally, ascending to the Purple Court.
The Sacred Treasures’ Talismans universally benefit all beings.
The Original Sovereign’s Qi arrives, merging with my body.
My merit surpasses all—Heaven and Earth are at peace.
Merging with the Dao.

**Five Qi of Dark Heaven, the Primordial Beginning wanders.**
The Star of the Hour shines brightly, illuminating the Great Enclosure.
The Black Spirit Venerable God, named **Ceng Wei.**
Commanding the flying crown, with silk robes and feathered garments.
Guarding the Five Gates, inspecting and capturing the guilty.
Dare any to provoke—let them be shattered and felled.
The Jade Talisman declares, the God’s might subdues the Eight Powers.
Evil gates are sealed, the True Dao clearly opens.
Illuminating my body, the Three Lights shine together.
Riding the void, floating in flight, my form ascends as an immortal.
Merging with the Dao.

**One Qi of Yellow Heaven, harmonizing Heaven and Earth.**
Forging Yin and Yang, commanding the Mysterious True.
The Star of the Constellation radiates, its brilliance flowing through the Nine Heavens.
Awakening the Bright Child, named **Tian Lian.**
The Original Qi’s Yang essence flames upward in vermilion mist.
Piercingly illuminating all under Heaven, and my body.
A hundred evils are crushed, ten thousand ghosts slain.
The **Zhong Shan** (Central Mountain) Incantation—let all under Heaven obey.
The Five Spirits are pacified, my body ascends as an immortal.
Merging with the Dao.

**Strike the Law Drum twenty-four times.**

**The Supreme Three-Heaven Primordial Beginning, Three Qi—**
**The Most High Dao Lord, the Most High Laozi—**
**Summon forth from my body the Three Five Functionaries, the Left and Right Officials and Messengers, the Left and Right Incense-Bearers, the Dragon Post Cavalry Officers, the Attendant Golden Boys, the Flower-Scattering Jade Maidens, the Five Emperors’ True Talismans, the Direct-Sun Incense Officials—**
**A total of thirty-six persons emerge.**

**Those who emerge are arrayed in splendid attire, with caps and trailing ribbons.**
**Open the gates of the Mysterious Altar to the Land and Domain Spirits.**

**Now, in this quiet night as I practice the Way, I humbly present my sincere intentions.**
**All my earnest sentiments have been recorded and reported.**
**May the Ten-Directional True Dao Qi and Sacred Treasures’ Radiant Light descend, flowing into my body,**
**So that my words may swiftly reach the Supreme Most High Unoriginated and Boundless Great Dao, before the august **Hao Tian Yu Huang Di, the Jade Emperor of Heaven.**

**Request to declare the ritual rank.**
**The humble servant of rank [position], along with all the assembled officials of the altar, now burns incense,**
**Offering these merits to the Heavenly Son, kings and lords, ministers and officials, scriptural masters, mountain-dwelling and rock-dwelling cultivators, fellow students of the Way, kin and relatives, all people under Heaven, flying and rooted beings, and all sentient life.**

**Now, burning this incense, I dedicate my body, my spirit, and my command to the Supreme Sacred Treasures of the Natural, True, Unoriginated, and Boundless Dao.**

**I beseech the granting of forgiveness for myself and the ritual assembly, as well as the fasting Daoists of this practice, including my teachers and disciples, for all past and present transgressions and grave offenses.**
**May we escape the Three Evil Wheels of Rebirth, free from the Ten Sufferings, Eight Hardships, and Nine Calamities,**
**Attaining the Dao’s True Essence, flying through the void, ascending to Heaven in broad daylight,**
**Serving the Dao Lords in the boundless Golden Palace of the Seven Treasures, eternally merging with the Dao,**
**As my words are conveyed and felt before the Supreme Most High Unoriginated and Boundless Dao.**

**Repentance. Proclaim the True Text.**

**The humble servant of rank [position], along with all the assembled officials of the altar,**
**Sincerely address the Three Pure Ones of Highest Holiness, the Ten Extremes of Highest Perfection, the Ten-Directional Sacred Treasures Heavenly Venerables, the Venerables of Erasing Offenses and Extinguishing Sin, the Venerables of Great Compassion and Extended Longevity, the Venerables of Everlasting Life and Preserved Command, the Nine-Heaven Natural-Generated Divine Sovereign of Heaven, the Degrees of the Primordial Emperor, the Thirty-Two Heavenly Emperors, the Heavenly Venerables and Heavenly Emperors, the Upper Clarity Sun, Moon, Stars, and Milky Way Assembly of True Ones, the Three Officials and Four Saints, the Five Teachers and Three Ministries True Lords, the Nine-Heaven Celestial Registrars, the True Lords of All Dynasties Who Transmitted the Lineage and Opened the Teachings, the Thunderous Tiger Divine Physicians and All Official Commanders, the Supreme Stages of Scriptures and Talismans’ Immortal Officials and Clerks, the Emperor of the Underworld’s Acid Fields, the Holy Assembly of the Netherworld, the Emperor of the Water Palace’s Vermilion Forest and Immortal Grove, the True Immortals of Langyan, the Five Sacred Emperors of the Five Peaks and Five Heavens, the Acid Fields’ Earthly Deities, the Commanding Generals of the Dry Element, the Tai Sui Earth-Fire, the Temperate Officials and Holy Assembly, the Gods of States, Counties, and City Walls, the Gods of the Local Shrines and Altars, the True Officials of the Land, the Ritual Altar’s Subordinate Officials and Commanders, the Three Realms’ Soul-Snatching and Spirit-Binding Messengers, the Four Realms’ Direct-Talisman Functionaries, the Masters of the Ritual Feast, and all Mighty and Spirited Ones.**

chunks.original_text: 恭望洪慈，洞垂照鉴。 臣闻元始祖劫，强名之所难称； 虚无自然，飞玄之所开化。 生天生地，成象成形。 一气之极流通，万物之得咸备。 人独称於最贵，必有根元； 道本出於厥中，当知祖始。 臣等自开辟以后，缠生死之缘。 知轮回之苦，而未出苦轮； 知性命之真，而未全真性。 徒以参经佩戒，演教宣科，求太上希夷之根，究有物混成之始，使知道知身者，早还纯而返素； 而炼神炼气者，速出有而入无。 昔尝告盟以参传，约当溥度； 今遇皈投而礼谢，事在可伸。 弟子词诚，谨当宣奏。 宣词。 谛详词语，灼见至诚。 激切之念已倾，方寸之诚不息。 恭遵禁戒，备按典彝，建坛遗以肃严，望穹窿而恳请。 惟坚一缕之念，上通十极之真。 自知昧元炁於多生，散冲和於万有，逐世缘而不修上道，萦爱习而莫返玄根，未能自诚，何以普度。 尽从前而一洗，当自此以重修。 臣等谨为沐浴五体，澄炼六情，法地象天，赍香奉信，以今日今时启坛，依仪行事。 至某日某时，延降上真，谢过忏愆，祈恩请命，辄依科法，宿以启闻。 恩惟太上三清，十方上圣，垂慈监映，省览所陈，勑勒灵宝官属、土地真官，一合同心，并力卫护，扫荡内外，清静坛场，降伏妖魔，诚灭邪祟，使臣等心安神定，思念立感，启奏御达，善功成就，无有窒滞，所愿随心。 臣等虽佩正真，参修大法，处身五浊，染迹六尘，三关未调，六情放诞，仰赖禁戒，以捡身心。 然后格降上真，导迎景贶，明晨行道，续更以闻，谨启。 十二愿。 复炉。 谨摄香官使者、左右龙虎君、侍香诸灵官，当令臣向来肃启行道之所，自然生金液丹碧，芝英百灵，众真交会，在此香火炉前。 当愿十方仙童玉女，接侍香烟，传臣向来所启之诚，速达径御至真无极大道、昊天玉皇上帝御前。 出堂颂。 出户。
chunks.translated_text:
**In humble reverence, we behold Your boundless mercy, Your all-pervading and enlightening gaze.

We, Your servants, have heard that the Primordial Ancestor of the Eon *(元始祖劫)* is a name too lofty to be fully articulated; the Void of Naturalness *(虚无自然)* is the realm where the Soaring Mysteries *(飞玄)* unfold and manifest. You give birth to Heaven and Earth, forming their shapes and essences. From the extreme convergence of **Qi** *(一气之极)*, all things flow and are harmoniously complete *(流通，万物之得咸备)*.

Among all beings, humans alone are deemed most noble and must possess a fundamental root *(根元)*; the **Dao** *(道)* originates from this very source, and thus we recognize the Primordial Ancestor *(祖始)*.

Since the dawn of creation *(开辟)*, we have been ensnared in the cycle of birth and death *(缠生死之缘)*. We know the suffering of transmigration *(轮回之苦)* yet remain trapped within it; we grasp the true nature of life and death *(性命之真)* yet fail to fully embody its purity. In vain, we have studied the scriptures, worn the precepts, expounded teachings, and proclaimed doctrines, seeking the root of the Supreme Primordial *(太上希夷之根)* and exploring the origin of the mixed formation of existence *(有物混成之始)*. May those who now understand the **Dao** and their true bodies *(知道知身者)* swiftly return to their pristine and unadulterated essence *(还纯返素)*; may those who refine spirit and **Qi** *(炼神炼气者)* quickly transcend the realm of existence and enter the Void *(出有入无)*.

In the past, we once vowed to uphold the transmitted teachings, striving to broaden our understanding and enlightenment. Now, as we humbly submit and offer gratitude, our earnest intentions may be fulfilled. Our disciples’ words are sincere; we shall diligently proclaim them.

**Proclamation of Words.** With meticulous care, we scrutinize our language, and our hearts’ sincerity is manifest. Our fervent resolve has been fully expressed; the purity of our intent does not wane. We reverently observe the prohibitions and precepts, meticulously follow the canonical rituals *(典彝)*, establish the altar with solemnity *(肃严)*, and gaze toward the vault of Heaven *(穹窿)* as we earnestly petition.

May our steadfast single thread of devotion *(一缕之念)* ascend to the Supreme Truth of the Ten Extremes *(十极之真)*. We realize that our primordial **Qi** *(元炁)* is obscured through countless rebirths, and our harmonious essence *(冲和)* is scattered among all things. We cling to worldly attachments *(世缘)* without cultivating the **Dao** above, ensnared by habits of love *(爱习)* and unable to return to the Mysterious Root *(玄根)*. Without true sincerity, how can we hope for universal enlightenment?

Let us now abandon all past impurities in a single purification, and from this very day, we shall earnestly renew our practice. We, Your servants, shall solemnly bathe our five bodies *(五体)*, refine our six emotions *(六情)*, align ourselves with the Earth yet mirror Heaven *(法地象天)*, and carry incense with unwavering faith *(赍香奉信)*. With this day and hour, we open the altar, adhering to ritual propriety *(依仪行事)*.

On the appointed day and hour *(至某日某时)*, we shall invite the descent of the Supreme Truths *(延降上真)*, offer thanks and repentance *(谢过忏愆)*, and beseech blessings and divine commands *(祈恩请命)*. In accordance with the prescribed rites *(科法)*, we shall report this in advance *(宿以启闻)*.

May the blessings of the Supreme Primordial Three *(太上三清)*, the Ten-Directional Supreme Saints *(十方上圣)*, descend upon us with mercy and illumination. May they oversee and inspect our humble petitions, and command the Spirited Officials of the **Lingbao** *(灵宝官属)*, the True Officials of the Land *(土地真官)*, to unite in heart, combine their strength, and protect us—cleansing and purifying the altar within and without, subduing demons and malevolent spirits *(降伏妖魔)*, extinguishing all evil influences *(诚灭邪祟)*—so that our minds may be at peace and our spirits steadfast. May our sincere thoughts be immediately answered, and our petitions swiftly conveyed to the Celestial Sovereign. May our virtuous deeds be accomplished without obstruction, and our wishes fulfilled as we desire. Without hindrance, our aspirations shall be realized.

Though we wear the badge of the Supreme Truth *(佩正真)*, study the Great Law *(参修大法)*, dwell within the Five Turbidities *(处身五浊)*, and bear the stains of the Six Dusts *(染迹六尘)*, our Three Passes *(三关)* remain unaligned, and our Six Emotions *(六情)* are unrestrained. We rely solely on the prohibitions and precepts to restrain our bodies and minds *(捡身心)*.

Then, may the Supreme Truths descend upon us, guiding and welcoming the radiant blessings *(导迎景贶)*. At dawn, we shall perform the **Dao** *(明晨行道)*, and continue the rites as we report *(续更以闻)*. Respectfully proclaimed.

**Twelve Vows.** Restoring the Furnace. We earnestly summon the Incense Officials and Messengers *(香官使者)*, the Left and Right Dragon-Tiger Officials *(左右龙虎君)*, and the attendant Spirited Officials of the Incense *(侍香诸灵官)*. May they command that at the place where we formerly solemnly invoked and walked the **Dao** *(臣向来肃启行道之所)*, there shall naturally arise the Golden Elixir and Azure Jade *(金液丹碧)*, the Hundred Spirited Herbs and Blossoms *(芝英百灵)*, and the gathering of all True Ones *(众真交会)*, right here before this Incense Furnace.

May it be our vow that the Celestial Youth and Jade Maidens of the Ten Directions *(十方仙童玉女)* attend and receive the incense smoke, swiftly transmitting our sincere invocation *(所启之诚)* to the Supreme Primordial, the Boundless Great **Dao** *(至真无极大道)*, and the Celestial Jade Emperor’s august presence *(昊天玉皇上帝御前)*.

**Eulogy Upon Exiting the Hall.** Exiting the Hall, we chant. Departing the Gate.

chunks.original_text: 道门科范大全集卷之六十九竟 道门科范大全集卷之七十 道士修真谢罪仪 清旦行道 法事升坛如式。 各礼师存念如法。 宣卫灵咒。 青阳虚映，耀日回灵。 神虎辟邪，飞天流铃。 摧奸灭试，万魔束形。 九微回道，八威摄精。 千真校录，三元荡清。 左啸中黄，右策六丁。 七转八合，周旋天经。 圣化巍巍，大道兴行。 庆云流布，合景黄庭，和与道合真。 呜法鼓二十四通。 无上三天玄元始三炁，太上道君，太上老君，召出臣身中三五功曹，左右官使者，左右捧香，驿龙骑吏，侍香金童，传言散花玉女，五帝直符，直日香官，合三十六人出。 出者严装显服，冠带垂缨，关启玄坛土地，方域神真。 臣今清旦行道，谨奉为入意，其诸情悃，已录奏闻，愿得太上十方至真道炁，灵宝瑞光下降，流入臣身中，令臣所启，速达径御太上无极大道、昊天玉皇上帝御前。 请称法位。 具位臣某与合坛众官等，谨同诚上启，三清上圣，十极高真，十方太上灵宝天尊，消愆灭罪天尊，大慈延寿天尊，长生保命天尊，九霄自然生神上帝，度人太皇，三十二天上帝，诸天天尊，诸天上帝，上清日月星斗河汉群真，三官四圣，五师三省真君，九天天曹，诸位真君，历代传宗启教诸大师真，雷霆神虎天医诸司官将，太上诸阶经箓中仙官将吏，天下名山得道神仙，地府邓都大帝，幽阴圣众，水府扶桑丹林大帝，阆苑真仙，人元五岳五天圣帝，酆都地祇，诸司元帅、太岁土火、温司圣众、州县城隍主者，当境庙社神祇，福庭土地真官，法坛诸司官将，三界提魂摄魄神兵，四界直符功曹使者，醮筵主宰，一切真仙。 恭望洪慈，洞回渊鉴。 臣等夤缘夙命，获履法门，遵太极之元科，佩上清之秘箓，广宣奥旨，以效涓诚。 今则玉宇澄清，宝坛严肃，奉霄纲而致款，跂真驭以垂临，享此洁修，应其昭告，既承词旨，敢不上闻。 宣词。 按如词陈，情诚丹切。 正一道士臣某等叨承福会，愿被真风，幸依清净之门，冀悟希夷之旨。 而念尘劳障蔽，懊恼攀缘，驰心徒系於三清，委迹难逃於陆海，功微毫发，衅积丘山，五行为命运之栽，星曜构照临之厄，非凭忏谢，莫遂消禳。 是以信质心，延真设礼，命正一之净众，启灵宝之清坛，夙奉熏修，克期通感。 以今清旦行道，请法众等运兹初捻上香，愿此香烟，腾空径上，供养至真无上道宝。 臣等皈身、皈神、皈命，以是功德，上祝今上皇帝。 伏愿宝图巩固，椿寿遐长。 圣政日新，建皇极立大中之道； 帝德天辅，亘万世隆不拔之基。 兆庶宅心，八方同轨。 文阶武秩，吋赞熙朝。 玉叶金枝，昭宣景运。 恩均遐迩，泽被幽明。 蒙道化以召和，沐玄风而交泰。 今故烧香，自皈依道尊大圣众至真之德。 得道之后，升入无形，和与道合真。 以今清旦行道，请法众等运兹二捻上香，愿此香烟，腾空径上，供养至真无上经宝。 臣等皈身、皈神、皈命，以是功德，归流正一道士臣某等，三师九祖，近化先亡，道俗亲缘，尊卑眷属。 伏愿削落地简，灌炼形魂，债讼息缘，冤仇罢对，入明霞之境，沐流火之庭，永出重冥，克登净域。 真师玄友，灵药神丹，愿拯昏迷，迥赐通感。 今故烧香，自皈依经尊大圣众至真之德。 得道之后，升入无形，和与道合真。

**Ritual of Daoist Cultivation and Repentance for Offenses**

At dawn, the Dao is walked in solemnity. The ritual ascends the platform as prescribed.
Each pays homage to the Master in accordance with the law.
The **Spirit-Guardian Incantation** is proclaimed.

The **Pure Yang** shines forth, its radiance returning the numinous.
The **Divine Tiger** repels malevolence, the **Flying Celestial** tolls its bells.
The wicked are crushed, the false are annihilated—ten thousand demons bound in form.
The **Nine Mysteries** return the **Dao**, the **Eight Powers** subdue the essence.
A thousand **True Ones** inspect the records; the **Three Primordials** purge the clear.
The **Left Whistle** summons the **Central Yellow**, the **Right Baton** marshals the **Six Ding**.
Seven revolutions, eight unions—circulating the **Heavenly Classics**.
The **Sacred Transformation** stands majestic; the **Great Dao** moves in action.
Auspicious clouds flow abroad, merging with the **Yellow Court**—harmonizing with the **Dao** and the **True**.

The **Supreme Law-Drum** is struck twenty-four times.

The **Supreme Three Heavens’ Primordial Origin’s Three Qi**—
The **Most High Dao Lord**, the **Most High Laozi**—
summon forth from within my body the **Three Five Functionaries**, the **Left and Right Officials and Messengers**, the **Left and Right Incense-Bearers**, the **Postal Dragon Riders**, the **Incense-Serving Golden Boys**, the **Flower-Scattering Jade Maidens**, the **Five Emperors’ Direct Symbols**, the **Direct-Sun Incense Officials**—
a total of **Thirty-Six** emerging.

Those who emerge are clad in solemn, resplendent robes,
their headgear and sashes adorned with trailing plumes.
They open the **Mysterious Altars** of the **Land and Domain Spirits**, the **Territorial Deities and True Ones**.

I, your servant, now walk the **Dao** at dawn in solemnity,
and humbly offer this as my sincere intent.
My deepest emotions have been recorded and presented—
may the **Most High’s Ten-Directional True Dao-Qi** and the **Numinous Treasure Auspicious Light** descend,
flowing into my body,
so that my invocation may swiftly reach the **Most High’s Boundless Great Dao** and the **Celestial Jade Emperor’s august presence**.

**Invocation of the Law-Position.**
Your servant of such-and-such rank, along with the assembled officials of the altar,
sincerely and together present our invocation to:
The **Three Pure Ones, Most Sacred**, the **Ten Extremes’ High True Ones**, the **Ten Directions’ Most High Numinous Treasure Celestial Worthies**,
the **Worthy Who Extinguishes Faults and Annihilates Offenses**, the **Worthy of Great Mercy and Extended Longevity**, the **Worthy of Eternal Life and Preserved Vitality**,
the **Natural-Generated Divine Sovereign of the Ninth Heaven**, the **Supreme Sovereign Who Transmits Humankind**, the **Thirty-Two Heavenly Sovereigns**,
all **Celestial Worthies and Sovereigns**, the **Upper Clarity Sun-Moon-Stars-Constellations-Galaxy Cluster of True Ones**,
the **Three Officials and Four Saints**, the **Five Teachers and Three Provincial True Lords**,
the **Nine Heavenly Celestial Registrars**, the **True Lords of All Generations Who Transmit the Lineage and Open the Teachings**,
the **Thunder-Tiger Divine Physicians and All Officials and Generals**, the **Celestial Officials and Clerks of the Most High’s Various Stages of Scriptures and Talismans**,
the **Named-Mountain Immortals Who Have Attained the Dao**,
the **Dengtu Emperor of the Underworld**, the **Holy Assemblies of the Netherworld**,
the **Fu-Sang Cinnabar Forest Emperor of the Water Palace**, the **True Immortals of Langyuan**,
the **Five Peaks and Five Celestial Sacred Emperors of Humanity**, the **Yingdu Earth Deities**,
the **Commanders-in-Chief of All Departments**, the **Year-Lord Earth-Fire**, the **Temperate Officials and Sacred Assemblies**,
the **Local Temple and Shrine Deities**, the **True Officials of the Blessing Court**,
the **Altar Officials and Generals**, the **Three Realms’ Spirit-Soldiers Who Extract Souls and Seize Spirits**,
the **Four Realms’ Direct-Symbol Functionaries and Messengers**, the **Ritual Feast Overseers**,
and **all True Immortals**.

With reverent gaze upon their boundless mercy,
and penetrating insight into their profound discernment—
we, your servants, by fate’s early appointment,
have attained the **Law-Gate**,
following the **Primordial Standards of the Great Polarity**,
bearing the **Secret Talismans of Upper Clarity**,
broadly proclaiming the **Deepest Intentions**,
to offer our sincere devotion.

Now, the **Jade Palace** is pure and clear,
the **Treasure Altar** solemn and august.
We present the **Celestial Regulations** with utmost reverence,
and stand in awe before the **True Ones’ Vehicles**,
enjoying this pure cultivation,
responding to their manifest proclamation.
Having received their words,
how dare we not present them above?

**Proclamation of the Words.**
As the words are laid out, the sincerity is as deep as cinnabar.
The **Orthodox Unity Daoist** your servant of such-and-such rank,
by fortune’s grace, has wished to be touched by the **True Wind**,
and happily relied upon the **Pure Gate**,
hoping to awaken to the **Mysterious and Profound Intentions**.

Yet, considering the obscurations of dusty toil,
the remorse and vexation of clinging to attachments,
my heart races in vain toward the **Three Pure Ones**,
while my footsteps cannot escape the **land and sea**.
My merits are as slight as a hair’s breadth,
while my offenses accumulate like mountains and rivers.
The **Five Phases** shape my fate’s cultivation,
and the **stars and constellations** weave the calamities of their illumination—
without repentance and atonement,
how could these be dispelled?

Thus, with **sincere faith and pure heart**, we extend true rites,
commanding the **Orthodox Unity Pure Assembly** to open the **Numinous Treasure Pure Altar**,
and for ages have we perfumed and refined our practice,
now fulfilling our destined resonance.

At this dawn, as we walk the **Dao**, we request the assembled **Law-Crowd** to light this **first incense-stick**,
wishing this incense-smoke to ascend directly to the heavens,
offering sustenance to the **Supreme True Dao-Treasure**.

We, your servants, **return our bodies, return our spirits, return our fates**,
and with this merit,
pray for the **Current Emperor**.
May the **Sacred Map** be firmly established,
and the **Sage’s longevity** extend far and long.
May **Sovereign Governance** renew daily,
and the **Royal Virtue** uphold the **Great Middle Dao**;
may the **Imperial Virtue** be heaven-supported,
enduring through ten thousand ages as an unshaken foundation.
May the **myriad peoples** take root in harmony,
and the **civil and martial ranks** assist the flourishing dynasty.
May the **Jade Lineage and Golden Branches** proclaim auspicious destiny,
and **grace extend near and far**, benefiting both the living and the dead.
May we be blessed by the **Dao’s Transformation** to call forth harmony,
and bathed in the **Mysterious Wind** to achieve great peace.

Now, we burn this incense,
and **return in devotion to the Dao-Emperor’s Great Sacred Assembly of True Ones**.
After attaining the **Dao**, we ascend to the **Formless**,
harmonizing with the **Dao** and the **True**.

At this dawn, as we walk the **Dao**, we request the assembled **Law-Crowd** to light this **second incense-stick**,
wishing this incense-smoke to ascend directly to the heavens,

the **Three Teachers and Nine Ancestors**, the **Recently Deceased Who Were Transformed**,
our **Daoist and Secular Kin**, our **superiors and inferiors, our relatives**—
may their **earthly records be erased**,
their **forms and spirits refined**,
their **debts and grievances extinguished**,
their **resentments and feuds laid to rest**,
so they may enter the **Realm of Bright Dews**,
be bathed in the **Court of Flowing Fire**,
and forever depart the **Nine Hells**,
ascending to the **Pure Domain**.

May the **True Teachers and Mysterious Friends** grant **Divine Medicines and Sacred Elixirs**,
and rescue the **bewildered**, bestowing **enlightened resonance**.

Now, we burn this incense,
and **return in devotion to the Scripture-Emperor’s Great Sacred Assembly of True Ones**.

harmonizing with the **Dao** and the **True**.

chunks.original_text: 正一之风，宣行於东汉。 自虚皇之造物，至道为先； 暨盘古之开天，神化为主。 东罗飞景，西列灵丘，南挹丹陵，北峙元阙。 乃有上圣执符之帝，高真御极之尊，坐镇九清，总摄三界，斡旋二气，朝会万神，广扇慈风，聿临下土。 今遇天元之宝运，特敷龙汉之化源，溥济人伦，俾登寿域。 正一道士臣某，生逢昭代，长遇休期，得○玄门，获披妙训，师资开度，佩奉灵文，缘累○驰，沉迷邪境。 三会五臈，有亏朝奏之功； 八节三元，多珠进修之礼。 六阳十直，崇奉愆期； 甲子庚申，祷析疏礼。 斋分九等，岂洞晓於真诠； 功立三千，罔有依於圣训。 科禁至重，奉措多违，戒律威严，修持有阙。 心非意乱，犯百八十条； 识浅智愚，冒三百大戒。 六情十恶，过积丘山； 九结十缠，愆深巨海。 衅盈黑簿，罪结冥司，致使殃咎日深，灾危旋至。 所以叩玄关而有请，望丹阙以知归，揆日投诚，披心效信，式敷坛席，备举明科，稽首诸天，告盟三界，馨荐芬芳於百和，华灯洞焕於九光，五灵灿丹篆之符，八会演玄都之奥。 监观法事，三师垂保举之恩； 赏录斋功，四司定禄命之简。

**The Wind of the Zhengyi Dao** spread in the **Eastern Han**.
From the **Primordial Heavenly Worthy’s** creation of the cosmos,
the **Dao** was held as supreme;
When **Pangu** opened the heavens,
the **divine transformations** took precedence.

To the east, the **Flying Phoenix** arrayed its splendor,
to the west, the **Spiritual Peaks** stood in ranks;
to the south, the **Crimson Ridge** ascended,
to the north, the **Primordial Gate** loomed.

Thus arose the **Supreme Sage** who wields the **Symbol of Authority**,
the **Highest True Ones** who rule the **Celestial Pole**,
seated in dominion over the **Nine Purity**,
overseeing the **Three Realms**,
guiding the **Two Qi** in harmony,
convening the **Ten Thousand Spirits**,
broadly dispersing the **gentle winds of mercy**,
graciously descending upon the **lower earth**.

Now, in this age of the **Heavenly Treasure’s** auspicious cycle,
the **Dragon Han**’s **transformative source** is uniquely manifest,
universally benefiting all humankind,
that they may attain the **Domain of Longevity**.

The **Zhengyi Daoist** of humble station,
born in this **radiant era**,
long enduring fortunate times,
once gained entrance to the **Mysterious Gate**,
received the **wondrous teachings**,
and was guided by **master and lineage**,
bearing the **sacred texts** in reverence.
Yet through **accumulated karmic weight**,
I was ensnared in **erroneous realms**.

At the **Three Assemblies** and **Five Grand Rituals**,
I fell short in fulfilling the **morning tribute’s** duty;
During the **Eight Festivals** and **Three Celestial Cycles**,
I neglected the **rituals of advancement and cultivation**.

The **Six Yang** and **Ten Rectitudes**,
I honored yet still transgressed;
In the **Jiazi** and **Gengshen** years,
I performed **sparse and incomplete rituals**.

The **Nine Grades of Abstinence**,
I did not fully comprehend the **True Doctrine**;
The **Three Thousand Meritorious Deeds**,
I lacked reliance upon the **Sacred Teachings**.

The **precepts** are most grave,
and my observances often failed;
The **disciplinary laws** are stern,
yet my practice left gaps.

My **mind was not pure**, my **intentions disordered**,
violating the **One Hundred and Eight Precepts**;
My **wisdom was shallow**, my **understanding dim**,
transgressing the **Three Hundred Great Vows**.

The **Six Passions** and **Ten Evils**,
my offenses piled like mountains;
The **Nine Knots** and **Ten Entanglements**,
my faults sank deep as oceans.

My **transgressions filled the Black Register**,
my **guilt bound for the Underworld Judges**,
leading to ever-deepening calamities,
as disasters and perils swiftly approached.

Therefore, I knock upon the **Mysterious Gate** with prayer,
and gaze toward the **Crimson Gate** to seek return;
I **pledge my days** in sincere devotion,
and **bare my heart** in faithful submission.
Now I **spread the ritual platform**,
and **propose the clear precepts**,
**bowing in homage** to the **Honored Ones of the Three Realms**,
**vowing allegiance** across the **Three Realms**,
offering **fragrant incense** to the **Hundred Harmonies**,
and **illuminating the Nine Lights** with **flowering lamps**.
The **Five Spirits** gleam in the **Crimson Seal’s** talismans,
and the **Eight Assemblies** unfold the **Mysteries of the Dark Realm**.

As I **oversee the Daoist rites**,
the **Three Masters** bestow their **saving grace**;
For my **abstinence and meritorious deeds**,
the **Four Officials** decree the **Ordinances of Fate**.

**Heavenly Worthy of the Three Treasures of Daoist Scripture,**

chunks.original_text: 赦除罪咎，解释灾躔。 道果圆成，深造无为之理； 真源朗彻，独观众妙之门。 出生死根，离烦恼苦。 三师九祖，乘善贶以逍遥； 五族六亲，沐神休而康泰。 上愿三光明曜，五纬循躔，气序均调，生灵共庆。 干戈偃息，三边无烽燧之虞； 稼穑丰登，九域富农桑之业。 卞逮三涂幽境，六趣同伦，涵泳神波，沐浴灵泽，普跻寿域，咸乐真风。 道化所资，物情俱泰，上明天尊大慈之泽，下副臣等皈向之诚，谨启以闻。 十二愿。 复炉。 谨摄香官使者、左右龙虎君、侍香诸灵官，当令臣向来清旦行道之所，自然生金液丹碧，芝英百灵，众真交会，在此香火炉前。 当愿十方仙童玉女，接侍香烟，传臣向来所启之诚，速达径御至真无极大道、昊天玉皇上帝御前。 出堂颂。 出户。
chunks.translated_text:
The **transgressions are pardoned, the calamities dispelled**—
the **fruit of the Dao** attains its perfect roundness,
delving deep into the **principle of Non-Action**;
the **true source** shines forth,
gazing alone upon the **gateway of myriad mysteries**.

The **root of birth-and-death** is severed,
freeing from the **suffering of vexation**.

The **Three Masters and Nine Ancestors** ride upon **auspicious virtue** in **effortless ease**;
the **Five Clans and Six Relatives** bathe in **divine grace** and **prosperity**.

Above, I pray that the **Three Lights** shine resplendent,
the **Five Stars** follow their courses,
the **harmony of qi** be balanced,
and all living beings rejoice in common.

**Weapons rest in silence**, with no fear of **border alarms**;
**harvests abound**, and the **Nine Territories** flourish in **agricultural prosperity**.

I extend this grace to the **Three Realms of the Underworld**,
the **Six Paths of Rebirth**—
all immersed in **divine waves**, bathed in **sacred dew**,
ascending universally to the **Realm of Longevity**,
and rejoicing in the **True Wind**.

Through the **transformations of the Dao**, all beings thrive in **harmony**—
above, honoring the **Heavenly Venerable’s** vast compassion,
below, fulfilling the **sincerity of my humble devotion**,
I humbly submit this prayer.

**Twelve Vows fulfilled.**
**The Furnace Reborn.**

I solemnly command the **Incense Officials and Messengers**,
the **Left and Right Dragon-Tiger Lords**,
and the **Attendant Spirits of Fragrance**—
let them now cause the place where I formerly performed **morning rites** to spontaneously generate
**golden elixir and emerald jade**,
**hundreds of numinous herbs and spirits**,
as the **multitudes of True Ones** gather here before this **incense furnace**.

May I pray that the **celestial children and jade maidens of the Ten Directions**
attend to the **fragrant smoke**,
and swiftly convey my **earnest supplications**
directly to the **Supreme Dao of Non-Extreme Perfection**,
the **Jade Emperor of the Celestial Sovereign’s** august presence.

**The Hall Hymn is completed.**
**The Doorway is crossed.**

chunks.original_text: 道门科范大全集卷之七十竟 道门科范大全集卷之七十一 道士修真谢罪仪 临午行道 法事升坛如式。 各礼师存念如法。 宣卫灵咒。 丹灵朱火，炎霞激风。 赤轮刚运，天光八冲。 进威包罗，交变万方。 流金豁落，群魔灭踪。 辟奸破妖，明耀元功。 金符召制，蹑云策龙。 谣歌庆会，散花太空。 神化宜运，四极安隆。 伏御帝前，罔有不恭，与道合真。 鸣法鼓二十四通。 无上三天玄元始三炁，太上道君，太上老君，召出臣身中三五功曹，左右官使者，左右捧香，驿龙骑吏，侍香金童，传言散花玉女，五帝真符，直日香官，合三十六人出。 出者严装显服，冠带垂缨，关启玄坛土地，方域神真。 臣今临午行道，谨奉为入意，其诸情悃，已录奏闻，愿得太上十方至真道炁，灵宝瑞光下降，流入臣身中，令臣所启，速达俓御太上无极大道、昊天玉皇上帝御前。 请称法位。 具位臣某与合坛众官等，谨同诚上启，三清上圣，十极高真，十方太上灵宝天尊，消愆减罪天尊，大慈延寿天尊，长生保命天尊，九霄自然生神上帝，度人太皇，三十二天上帝，诸天天尊，诸天上帝，上清日月星斗河汉群真，三官四圣，五师三省真君，九天天曹，诸位真君，历代传宗启教诸大师真，雷霆神虎天医诸司官将，太上诸阶经箓中仙官将吏，天下名山得道神仙，地府酆都大帝，幽阴圣众，水府扶桑丹林大帝，浪苑真仙，人元五岳五天圣帝，酆都地祇，合干元帅、太岁土火、温司圣众、州县城隍主者，当境庙社神祇，福庭土地真官，法坛诸司官将，四界直符功曹使者，醮筵主宰，一切真仙。 恭望洪慈，洞垂昭鉴。 臣等先缘积庆，获奉皇恩，持真戒以修身，执灵符而度命，愧无寸效，将迪元风。 当激励於精衷，用宣行於秘赜。 惟天在上，俯怜有祷之诚； 况日之中，共仰无私之照。 登斋既肃，荐叹惟勤，行道词诚，谨当宣奏。 宣词。 谛详词语，备述丹衷。 仰冀感通，俯从至愿。 正一道士某，言念幸禀冲和之气，获归恬淡之宗。 虽身染俗尘，而心铭玄造，常虞懈怠，罔答生成。 用诹涓吉之辰，特设祈禳之醮，虔伸丹悃，上渎清虚，谢已往之愆尤，希将来之福佑。 臣等遵依科简，启建坛场，披灵宝科文，按真仙品格，恭修斋直，匪懈晨昏。 告上灵，关五亿之天； 达下恳，徧三千之境。 冀回鉴佑，普降恩光，克洽灵心，恪酬至愿。 以今临午行道，请法众等运兹初捻上香，愿此香烟，腾空俓上，供养太上三尊。 臣等皈身、皈神、皈命，以是功德，上祝今上皇帝。 伏愿寿与天齐，福如川至，高出百王之上，长为九有之尊，庙堂多稷契之忠，郡邑足龚黄之政，百蛮率服，多稼丰登，物无扎伤，民安康静，来航海梯山之贡，迎日书月至之祥，承灵宝之斋功，乐升平之景运。 今故烧香，自皈依道尊大圣众至真之德。 得道之后，升入无为，和与道合真。 以今临午行道，请法众等运兹二捻上香，愿此香烟，腾空俓上，供养太上尊经。 臣等皈身、皈神、皈命，以是功德，归流正一道士某，多生上祖，奕世先灵，虽负其道骨仙风，莫谐轻举空服乎。 荷衣蕙带，难脱沈沦，愿乘灵宝之功，受以飞仙之箓。 同列侍臣於上帝，并参法从於高穹。 今故烧香，自皈依经尊大圣众至真之德。
chunks.translated_text:
**The Completion of the Daoist Canon of Rituals and Precepts, Volume Seventy**
**The Daoist Canon of Rituals and Precepts, Volume Seventy-One**

**The Daoist Rite of Repentance for Cultivating the True Way**

At noon, the ritual is performed.
The **sacred rites** ascend the platform as prescribed.

Each pays homage to the **Master of the Dao** in reverent remembrance.
The **Guardian Incantations of the Spirit** are proclaimed.

**Danling** [丹靈] and **Zhuhuo** [朱火] blaze,
**Flame and Cloud** [炎霞] surge with the wind.
The **Red Wheel** [赤輪] moves with unyielding force,
as **Heavenly Light** [天光] strikes eightfold.
**Aura of Power** [進威] envelops all,
**Transformation and Exchange** [交變] pervade the Ten Directions.
**Golden Elixir** cascades, **demons vanish** [群魔滅踪],
**Evil ones are repelled and demons shattered** [辟奸破妖],
illuminating the **Primordial Merit** [元功].

**Golden Talismans** [金符] summon and command,
**Ascending the Clouds** [蹑雲] with the **Dragon-Clerks** [策龍].
**Chanting and Songs** [諧歌] celebrate the assembly,
**Scattering Flowers** [散花] into the **Void** [太空].

**Divine Manifestation** [神化] flows auspiciously,
**Four Quarters** [四極] stand in harmony.
**Submission before the Celestial Sovereign** [伏御帝前],
none dare be disrespectful—
**aligned with the Dao and the True** [與道合真].

The **Law Drum** [法鼓] resounds **twenty-four strokes** [二十四通].

Invoked are:
**The Three Primordial Powers of the Three Heavens** [無上三天玄元始三炁],
**The Supreme Daoist Lord** [太上道君],
**The Supreme Old Lord** [太上老君],
and the **Three Five Officials of Merit** [三五功曹] within my body,
the **Left and Right Officials and Messengers** [左右官使者],
those who **hold incense** [左右捧香],
the **Dragon-Clerks of the Relay** [驛龍騎吏],
the **Golden Boys Attending Incense** [侍香金童],
the **Jade Maidens Scattering Flowers** [傳言散花玉女],
the **True Talismans of the Five Emperors** [五帝真符],
the **Direct Sun Incense Officials** [直日香官],
and the **Thirty-Six Unified** [合三十六人]—
all emerge.

The **emerged** [出者] don **auspicious garb and sacred attire** [嚴裝顯服],
**headgear and sashes** [冠帶垂缨],
opening the **Mysterious Daoist Platform** [玄坛] to the **Land Deities** [土地],
and summoning the **Spirits of the Region and Domain** [方域神真].

I now perform the ritual at noon,
offering this **entreaty of sincerity** [入意].
All my **earnest supplications** [情悃] have been recorded and presented.
I pray that the **Supreme Daoist Spirit of the Ten Directions** [太上十方至真道炁],
**Sacred Treasure and Auspicious Light** [靈寶瑞光],
descend and enter my body,
so that my **supplications** may swiftly reach
the **Supreme Non-Extreme Dao** [無極大道],
the **Celestial Jade Emperor** [昊天玉皇上帝] in His august presence.

I request the **proclamation of my sacred rank** [稱法位].

With my **rank** [具位], **Daoist Certain** [道士某],
and the **unified assembly of officials** [合坛众官],
we **sincerely present our vows** [同诚上启] to:
**The Three Pure Ones** [三清],
**The Ten Extremes of High Perfection** [十极高真],
**The Supreme Daoist Sacred Treasure of the Ten Directions** [十方太上灵宝天尊],
**The Heavenly Lord of Removing Faults and Reducing Sins** [消愆减罪天尊],
**The Heavenly Lord of Great Mercy and Prolonged Life** [大慈延寿天尊],
**The Heavenly Lord of Longevity and Preserving Life** [长生保命天尊],
**The Natural God of the Ninth Heaven** [九霄自然生神上帝],
**The Great Sovereign of Salvation** [度人太皇],
**The Emperor of the Thirty-Two Heavens** [三十二天上帝],
**All Heavenly Lords and Emperors** [诸天天尊，诸天上帝],
**The Supreme Daoist Assembly of Sun, Moon, Stars, and Milky Way** [上清日月星斗河汉群真],
**The Three Officials and Four Saints** [三官四圣],
**The Five Teachers and Three Provinces of True Lords** [五师三省真君],
**The Heavenly Officials of the Nine Heavens** [九天天曹],
**All True Lords** [诸位真君],
**The Great Masters of Past Traditions** [历代传宗启教诸大师真],
**The Thunderous and Lightning Gods, the Heavenly Medical Officers** [雷霆神虎天医诸司官将],
**The Supreme Daoist Officials and Clerks of All Stages** [太上诸阶经箓中仙官将吏],
**The Named Mountain Immortals of the World** [天下名山得道神仙],
**The Great Emperor of the Underworld** [地府酆都大帝],
**The Holy Assembly of the Netherworld** [幽阴圣众],
**The Great Emperor of the Water Palace** [水府扶桑丹林大帝],
**The True Immortals of the Waves** [浪苑真仙],
**The Five Sacred Emperors of the Five Peaks** [人元五岳五天圣帝],
**The Land Deities of the Underworld** [酆都地祇],
**The Unified Commanders** [合干元帅],
**The Yearly Officer of Earth and Fire** [太岁土火],
**The Holy Assembly of the Warm Season** [温司圣众],
**The Local and County City Deities** [州县城隍主者],
**The Deities of All Temples and Shrines in This Realm** [当境庙社神祇],
**The Auspicious Land Deities of the Courtyard** [福庭土地真官],
**The Heavenly Officials of the Sacred Platform** [法坛诸司官将],
**The Direct Talismans of the Four Boundaries** [四界直符],
**The Merit Officials and Messengers** [功曹使者],
**The Masters of the Ritual Feast** [醮筵主宰],
and **all True Immortals** [一切真仙].

With **reverent awe** [恭望洪慈], we **implore the piercing insight** [洞垂昭鑑].

We, the Daoists,
have **accumulated past blessings** [先缘积庆],
received **Imperial Grace** [获奉皇恩],
and **uphold the True Precepts** [持真戒] to cultivate our bodies,
**wield the Sacred Talismans** [执灵符] to save our lives.
Yet, we **shamefully lack even an inch of merit** [愧无寸效],
and **dare to provoke the Primordial Wind** [将迪元风].

We **stir our sincerity** [激励於精衷],
and **proclaim our secrets** [用宣行於秘赜].

O **Heaven above** [惟天在上],
**look down** [俯怜] upon our **earnest prayers** [有祷之诚];
**especially now** [況日之中],
we **all reverence the boundless light** [共仰无私之照].

With the **sacrifice hall now solemn** [登斋既肃],
and **devout recitations earnest** [荐叹惟勤],
my **ritual words are sincere** [行道词诚],
and I **present them reverently** [谨当宣奏].

**Proclamation of Words** [宣词].

**Carefully examining each phrase** [谛详词语],
I **fully recount my sincere entreaties** [备述丹衷].
I **hope for divine response** [仰冀感通],
and **pray for fulfillment of my wishes** [俯从至愿].

**Daoist Certain** [正一道士某],
in **gratitude for the harmonious vital breath** [幸禀冲和之气],
has **returned to the School of Serenity** [获归恬淡之宗].

Though my **body is stained by worldly dust** [身染俗尘],
my **heart is inscribed with the Mysterious Workings** [而心铭玄造],
I **fear slackness and neglect** [常虞懈怠],
and **fail to answer the call of life** [罔答生成].

On this **auspicious day** [涓吉之辰],
I **specially establish this rite of supplication and expiation** [特设祈禳之醮],
**devoutly extending my sincere prayers** [虔伸丹悃],
**reaching the Pure Void** [上渎清虚],
**repenting past transgressions** [谢已往之愆尤],
and **seeking future blessings** [希将来之福佑].

We **follow the prescribed rituals** [遵依科简],
**erect the sacred platform** [启建坛场],
**unfold the Daoist Canon of Sacred Treasures** [披灵宝科文],
and **adhere to the ranks of True Immortals** [按真仙品格].
With **reverent fasting** [恭修斋直],
we **neither slacken at dawn nor dusk** [匪懈晨昏].

We **declare to the Spirits above** [告上灵],
**open the Five Billions of Heavens** [关五亿之天];
we **reach the prayers below** [达下恳],
**pervade the Three Thousand Realms** [徧三千之境].

We **hope for their discerning blessings** [冀回鉴佑],
**universally descending grace** [普降恩光],
and **fulfillment of our hearts’ desires** [克洽灵心],
**earnestly repaying our deepest wishes** [恪酬至愿].

With this **noon ritual** [临午行道],
I **request the assembly of the Law** [请法众] to **kindle this initial incense** [等运兹初捻上香].
I pray that this **fragrant smoke** [香烟] may **ascend to the heavens** [腾空俓上],
**offering worship to the Three Supreme Lords** [供养太上三尊].

We **return our bodies, spirits, and lives** [皈身、皈神、皈命],
and with this **merit**, we **bless the present Emperor** [上祝今上皇帝].
**May his life equal Heaven’s** [伏愿寿与天齐],
**his blessings flow like rivers** [福如川至],
**his virtue surpass all kings** [高出百王之上],
**his longevity be the honor of the Nine Realms** [长为九有之尊],
**his court filled with loyal ministers** [庙堂多稷契之忠],
**his counties governed with righteousness** [郡邑足龚黄之政],
**all barbarians submit** [百蛮率服],
**agriculture prospers and harvests abound** [多稼丰登],
**no living thing is harmed** [物无扎伤],
**the people dwell in peace and tranquility** [民安康静],
**tribute arrives from distant lands** [来航海梯山之贡],
**auspicious signs mark the heavens** [迎日书月至之祥],
and **the merit of this Sacred Treasure rite** [承灵宝之斋功]
**brings joy to the era of Great Peace** [乐升平之景运].

Now, as we **burn incense** [故烧香],
we **return in devotion to the Daoist Lord’s virtue** [自皈依道尊大圣众至真之德].

After **obtaining the Dao** [得道之后],
we **ascend to Non-Action** [升入无为],
**harmonizing with the True and the Dao** [和与道合真].

With this **noon ritual** [临午行道],

chunks.original_text: 於六阳十直，而惮持斋； 於三会五臈，而忘忏罪。 昧三关之调适，致六贼之相攘，营营斋醮之小缘，衮衮是非之苦海，贪多务得，乍喜还嗔。 进止频犯於坛规，宣演不知於禁忌，背违科戒，纵恣心神。 三明六暗之中，但迷邪境； 八节四时之内，罔有善功。 百渎自倾，气亡液漏。 三彭得计，祸结形枯。 深忧先世以迷真，恐逐浮生之夭丧。 求此忏禳之法，少伸首谢之诚。 遵奉典彝，恪修斋直。 玉华散景，龙烟凝车盖之形； 莲焰腾辉，凤烛灿芝兰之气。 荐以苹蘩之洁，藉以文彩之蠲，果实惟嘉，酒醴既旨，祈万神之来享，格一德之精纯，载扬微妙之音，上彻虚皇之听。 所冀三清上圣，十极高真，俯纳微诚，特垂巨贶，命三官而掌录，敕五帝以下观，赦已往之罪瑕，锡将来之禄算，密付长生之旨，潜敷驻世之方，飞天下观，大勋保举，云凝灵府，名入真阶。 断谷辟粮，食至和阴阳之气； 烧香接手，入太室璇玑之门。 逍遥上清，超波三界，得证无为之果，永除堕业之侵。 上愿国祚兴昌，帝图安镇，海宇即臻於康静，黎民共乐於升平，岁赡仓箱，物无疵疠，恩波所及，幽显俱沾，各遂攸宜，咸得其所。 臣等功圆六度，道证三便，谷隐寒栖，克登真果，上明天尊大慈之泽，下副臣等皈命之诚，谨启以闻。 十二愿。 复炉。 谨摄香官使者、左右龙虎君、侍香诸灵官，当令臣向来午朝行道之所，自然生金液丹碧，芝英百灵，众真交会，在此香火炉前。 当愿十方仙童玉女，接侍兰烟，传臣向来所启之诚，速达径御至真无极大道、昊天玉皇上帝御前。 出堂颂。 出户。

May **granaries overflow** [岁赡仓箱],
**No sickness or blemish afflict** [物无疵疠],
With **imperial grace extending far** [恩波所及],
Both **hidden and manifest beings blessed** [幽显俱沾],
Each **fulfilling their proper place** [各遂攸宜],
And **all finding their due** [咸得其所].

We, **having perfected the Six Perfections** [功圆六度],
And **attained the Three Easeful Paths** [道证三便],
**Retiring to cold seclusion** [谷隐寒栖],
Have **ascended to the True Fruit** [克登真果],
**Above, repaying the Heavenly Venerable’s boundless mercy** [上明天尊大慈之泽],
**Below, fulfilling our sincere conversion** [下副臣等皈命之诚].
**Respectfully submitted** [谨启以闻].

**Twelve Wishes.**
**Reignite the Furnace.**
**Respectfully, I command the Incense Officials and Messengers—**

**Gold Elixir and Jade-Green Dan** [金液丹碧],
**Mushrooms, herbs, and myriad spirits** [芝英百灵]
Naturally **converge**, with **all Worthies assembling** [众真交会],
**Before this incense furnace.**

**Swiftly to the Supreme Ultimate Great Dao’s Presence** [径御至真无极大道、昊天玉皇上帝御前].
